story: We need to upgrade from a cast iron skillet to a commercial grade roaster. This roaster has a cast iron drum which is important for us to maintain our roots. The roaster can roast a pound at a time, but can roast batches back to back and is built to last. We feel this is the most logical roaster for us to continue and grow our roasting business.

story:
Laufend integrieren!!!

“The reason we race isn't so much to beat each other,... but to be with each other.” ― Christopher McDougall, Born to Run:

Hallo, 

ich bin Sebastian Hallmann und Läufer. Während meines Trainings im Sportpark Hallbergmoos ist mir aufgefallen, dass sich dort praktisch täglich 20 und mehr junge "Asylbewerber" (unbegleitete minderjährige Flüchtlinge) aufhalten um dort sportlich ihren Tag zu gestalten oder die Zeit tot zuschlagen.

Die jugendlichen wurden aus der Bayernkaserne München nach Hallbergmoos verlegt und warten auf die Abwicklung ihres bürokratischen Verfahrens.

Meine Idee ist es, die Jugendlichen von der Straße auf die Laufstrecke zu holen und mit einem Sportprogramm ihre Integration zu unterstützen und mit der örtlichen Bevölkerung in Kontakt zu bringen.

In verschiedenen Gesprächen mit den Veranstaltern des Hallbergmooser Volksfestlaufs, einem Gemeinderat und der Administration der Asylbewerberunterkunft kam die Idee, die Jugendlichen in einen Lauftreff zur Vorbereitung auf den Volksfestlauf zu integrieren. Das Ziel ist neben einer Teilnahme am Volksfestlauf die "laufende" Integration der Jugendlichen, der Erwerb von Sprachkenntnissen in der Interaktion mit Muttersprachlern und somit eine Kommunikation der Asylbewerber mit der örtlichen Bevölkerung. In einem kurzen Gespräch mit einem Asylbewerber, er war der einzige der Gruppe der englisch konnte, wurde mir versichert, dass ich jetzt einen neuen Freund hätte :). Menschen kommen zusammen, wenn sie miteinander reden und umgekehrt.

Um das Projekt wirklich gut umzusetzen fehlt es leider an der nötigen Ausrüstung. Kleiderspenden sind in ausreichendem Maß vorhanden und Kleidung kann ich selbst nach über 20 Jahren im Laufsport und dank vieler Ausrüstungspakete zur Verfügung stellen. Den Jugendlichen fehlt es allerdings allgemein an Schuhen und im besonderen natürlich an Laufschuhen. Gebrauchte Laufschuhe in einem guten Zustand sind eher selten und da Schuhe der wichtigste Ausrüstungsteil für Läufer sind wären neue Schuhe schon toll und würden sicher auch sehr gut als Motivation ankommen :). Die Firma ASICS hat schon versichert, dass sie die Aktion unterstützen wird und sehr gute Konditionen angeboten.

Neben den Schuhen fallen sicher noch Kosten drumherum an, wie beispielsweise Sportriegel für den Hunger danach und sicher die ein oder andere Ausgabe nach dem Volksfestlauf, da ich die Aktion auch im Anschluss weiter laufen lassen will. Ob das Geld für gemeinschaftliche Shirts reicht wird sich zeigen. 

Als Ziel habe ich 3000,- € angegeben, da durch die Aussicht auf ein neues paar Laufschuhe sich sicher viele Teilnehmer aus den rund 80 Asylbewerbern finden lassen.

Ziel der Kampagne:

  • Laufschuhe
  • Kostendeckung des Drumherum um den Laufkurs und den Volkslauf
  • Integration der jugendlichen Asylbewerber
  • Etablierung des Programms für die Zukunft


Ich hoffe euer Interesse geweckt zu haben, da ich denke, dass über den Sport sehr viel bewirkt werden kann.

Ich wäre euch sehr verbunden, wenn ihr meine Aktion gut findet, diese auch über die gängigen sozialen Medien zu unterstützen.

Herzliche Grüße

Sebastian Hallmann
story_txt:
Laufend integrieren!!!“The reason we race isn't so much to beat each other,... but to be with each other.” 
― Christopher McDougall, Born to Run:Hallo, ich bin Sebastian Hallmann und Läufer. Während meines Trainings im Sportpark Hallbergmoos ist mir aufgefallen, dass sich dort praktisch täglich 20 und mehr junge "Asylbewerber" (unbegleitete minderjährige Flüchtlinge) aufhalten um dort sportlich ihren Tag zu gestalten oder die Zeit tot zuschlagen.Die jugendlichen wurden aus der Bayernkaserne München nach Hallbergmoos verlegt und warten auf die Abwicklung ihres bürokratischen Verfahrens.Meine Idee ist es, die Jugendlichen von der Straße auf die Laufstrecke zu holen und mit einem Sportprogramm ihre Integration zu unterstützen und mit der örtlichen Bevölkerung in Kontakt zu bringen.In verschiedenen Gesprächen mit den Veranstaltern des Hallbergmooser Volksfestlaufs, einem Gemeinderat und der Administration der Asylbewerberunterkunft kam die Idee, die Jugendlichen in einen Lauftreff zur Vorbereitung auf den Volksfestlauf zu integrieren. Das Ziel ist neben einer Teilnahme am Volksfestlauf die "laufende" Integration der Jugendlichen, der Erwerb von Sprachkenntnissen in der Interaktion mit Muttersprachlern und somit eine Kommunikation der Asylbewerber mit der örtlichen Bevölkerung. In einem kurzen Gespräch mit einem Asylbewerber, er war der einzige der Gruppe der englisch konnte, wurde mir versichert, dass ich jetzt einen neuen Freund hätte :). Menschen kommen zusammen, wenn sie miteinander reden und umgekehrt.Um das Projekt wirklich gut umzusetzen fehlt es leider an der nötigen Ausrüstung. Kleiderspenden sind in ausreichendem Maß vorhanden und Kleidung kann ich selbst nach über 20 Jahren im Laufsport und dank vieler Ausrüstungspakete zur Verfügung stellen. Den Jugendlichen fehlt es allerdings allgemein an Schuhen und im besonderen natürlich an Laufschuhen. Gebrauchte Laufschuhe in einem guten Zustand sind eher selten und da Schuhe der wichtigste Ausrüstungsteil für Läufer sind wären neue Schuhe schon toll und würden sicher auch sehr gut als Motivation ankommen :). Die Firma ASICS hat schon versichert, dass sie die Aktion unterstützen wird und sehr gute Konditionen angeboten.Neben den Schuhen fallen sicher noch Kosten drumherum an, wie beispielsweise Sportriegel für den Hunger danach und sicher die ein oder andere Ausgabe nach dem Volksfestlauf, da ich die Aktion auch im Anschluss weiter laufen lassen will. Ob das Geld für gemeinschaftliche Shirts reicht wird sich zeigen. Als Ziel habe ich 3000,- € angegeben, da durch die Aussicht auf ein neues paar Laufschuhe sich sicher viele Teilnehmer aus den rund 80 Asylbewerbern finden lassen.Ziel der Kampagne:
Laufschuhe
Kostendeckung des Drumherum um den Laufkurs und den Volkslauf
Integration der jugendlichen Asylbewerber
Etablierung des Programms für die Zukunft
Ich hoffe euer Interesse geweckt zu haben, da ich denke, dass über den Sport sehr viel bewirkt werden kann.Ich wäre euch sehr verbunden, wenn ihr meine Aktion gut findet, diese auch über die gängigen sozialen Medien zu unterstützen.Herzliche GrüßeSebastian Hallmann

story:
(PROJET MORT SUR INDIE, BIENTOT DE RETOUR SUR ULULE.. SUIVEZ NOUS SUR https://www.facebook.com/art.melting.nantes ou https://twitter.com/MeltingNantes MERCI! and please, share :) This is gonna be Legen.... wait for it... DARY)


         N

                a

MeltiNg

                t
                e
                S

Projet Humain Associatif-Multiculturel et résidence d'Atelier d'Artiste(s)

Basée à Nantes, l’association Melting Nantes occuperait une grande péniche sur deux étages, proche du "Lieu Unique", de la cité des congrès et de la gare, sur le canal Saint-Félix. 

L'activité principale sera l'échange musical dans un cadre "Salon de Thé" (pour l'aspect financier, afin de couvrir les frais de location de l'emplacement de la péniche) autour du piano quotidien et diffusion radiophonique Live. Musique alternative dans les espaces relaxation.

Animation Free-Style et impro - Publication événementielle - Concerts - Galerie d'expo d'art temporaire et permanente (peinture, sculpture, photographie etc) - Lieu d'échange et de partage multiculturel et poly-artistique. Streetride/Street Art.

Les espaces de vie : 

  • un espace réservé enseignement musical - prix libre - TROC - minimum requis,
  • un espace réservé médecine douce, bien être (sono/luminothérapie, relaxation, yoga) - prix libre - TROC - minimum requis,
  • un espace réservé expo/vente des œuvres communes en journée,
  • un espace réservé baby-foot filmé en permanence et en accord en vue de court métrage, ainsi qu'une scène d'impro théâtrale/danse/musique/chant (ouverte)
  • un espace extérieur réservé balançoire (sur le pont de la péniche, voire ponton d'accostage), plus détente: rocking-chairs, poufs, hamac, slackline.
Chiens, chats.. et autres animaux de compagnie admis; perroquets archi-bienvenus.
Chaque artiste devra, indépendamment de ses œuvres perso, créer et valoriser le bateau en parallèle. Elections des Artistes à l'unanimité.
Energie BIO et respect de l'environnement. Péniche et lieu éco-responsable/durable.


Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

Le montant du financement que nous recherchons (290,000$ ou 250 000€) couvrira :

·  l’acquisition de la péniche, les travaux de rénovation, l’installation du cadre/de l’atmosphère et la remise en état/conformité/sécurité.

·  L’achat des fournitures afin de lancer le projet dans une atmosphère propice à la réussite de celui-ci.

·  La couverture des "frais" indiegogo (marge de 4 ou 9% en fonction de l'aboutissement du projet).

La création/maintenance du site web de l'association,  community management, et de la partie stratégie de communication.

En contrepartie, chaque personne ayant participé au "funding" de notre projet associatif deviendra adhérent de l’association et sera invité à venir partager un moment de convivialité et d'échange culturel et artistique sur la péniche.

Dans l’éventualité où le projet n'aboutissait pas, les fonds seraient reversés à des associations humanitaires : http://www.mcm44.org/spip.php?article41 , ou ils vous seraient intégralement remboursé en cas de demande de votre part


D'autres façons d'aider

Vous ne pouvez pas contribuer mais notre projet associatif vous intéresse? Le meilleur moyen pour vous de nous aider est :

  • De passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de notre projet.
  • d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo (Facebook/Twitter/Email etc..)!

Et le tour est joué. 

Let's Melt Nantes in one single living, loving & sharing place!

MERCI A TOUS!


------------------------ ENGLISH VERSION --------------------------

Associative-Multicultural project and Artist's Studio residence (s) on Barge .. Exchange and Sharing

Based in Nantes, France, our association would occupy a large barge near the "Lieu Unique". The primary activity will be the musical exchange in a "Tea Room" (for the financial aspect, rental location of the boat) around the piano and daily Live radio broadcast. Alternative music in the relaxation areas.

Animation and Free-Style Improv - Publication evenementielle - Concerts - Gallery expo temporary and permanent art (painting, sculpture, photography etc) - Exchange Place and multicultural sharing and poly-artistic. Streetride: skate, longboard, roller ..

The living areas:

  • an area for music education - free price - BARTER - minimum required,
  • an area  for alternative medicine, wellness (PA / light therapy, relaxation, yoga) - free price - BARTER - minimum required,
  • an area  for exhibition / sale of common works during the day,
  • an area for table football, filmed constantly with agreement for short film.. And an open scene for theater/dance/music/singing improvisation,
  • an outdoor area swing (on the deck of the barge or boat dock), plus relaxation/yoga, rocking chairs, ottomans, hamacs, slacklines.

Dogs, cats etc .. and parrots are very welcome.

Each artist will, regardless of his personal works, develop & participate to the boat atmosphere in parallel. There will be "best" artist elections.

Green Energy and environmental spirit. Eco-friendly barge.

What we need and what you get

The amount of funding ($ 290,000 or € 250,000) will cover the purchase of part of the barge, renovation, part of the installation and refurbishment compliance / security. Purchase of supplies to start the project in an atmosphere conducive to the success of this one. Coverage of "fresh" Indiegogo (margin of 4 or 9% depending on the outcome of the project). Creation / maintenance of the website of the association and community management.

In return, each person involved in the "funding" of our association project will be welcome to share a moment of conviviality and Artistic and cultural exchange.

The idea that the project is not successful, the funds will be donated to humanitarian organizations: http://www.mcm44.org/spip.php?article41 or you'd be reimbursed on demand.

Other ways to help

You can not help but our association project interests you? The best way for you to help us:

To spread the word and advertise around our project.

Indiegogo to use sharing tools (Facebook / Twitter / Email etc ..)!

And voila. Let's Melt Nantes in one single living & sharing place!

THANK YOU ALL!

story:
The Nazaré Productions Project


Short Summary

My name is David Langer; a professional big wave surfer from Maui, and my dream is to ride the biggest waves I have ever seen and bring that experience to viewers at home. 

Over the years, some of the most famous big waves have been documented by the surfers who surf them.  Here in the traditional fishing town of Nazaré, Portugal, a sleeping giant has awoken - and it’s only proper that we greet her accordingly.  To do this, my team and fellow athletes have a plan to showcase the beauty of big wave surfing at Nazaré, and your help would be crucial to our success.  Not that it hasn't already started, it's just the beginning is all.

Inspired by Nelson Mandela and his statement, “Sports have the power to change the world.”, I believe that we can use the sport of big wave surfing to open people's minds to the power of the ocean and the athletes that choose to face it. 

My campaign here in Nazaré is important to me for a few reasons: The first being safety. Much like a race team in the world of motorsports, we need to be as safe and organized as possible while pushing the limits of this fairly new sport. Second, there is a crew of talented individuals who are not only rooting me on, but working to make this dream a reality. These individuals are my teammates, and as such, need to be paid for their efforts in helping me to achieve this dream. The third reason why this project is so important to me is that it will help to attract corporate sponsorship once the team is established, thanks to your contributions. 

The magnitude of accomplishing this task is huge in that it will push the world of surfing as we know it. Due to the serious risks that encompass this sport, the rewards for achieving the goals of riding a wave this size and documenting it for future generations of big wave surfers, are tremendous. We are at the cutting edge of action sports, and your contribution can be the fuel to lighting the fire in making it happen. 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to achieve our goals, the funding necessary to accomplish the first phase of development is $150,000 USD. 

Breakdown: 

1. Photo and video equipment totalling $12,000 is vital to presenting the project in the minimum 4K quality that is expected in productions of this nature. 

2. $120,000 is necessary for the vehicles. This includes; two Jet Skis, two trailers, and two Quads. Or better yet, two Quadskis - as they would be more effective, safer, and a much better marketing tool to attract attention to this ever growing sport. Not only does this price reflect the cost of equipment, but also the shipping and taxes of these products from Michigan to Portugal. 

3. To cover the costs of a warehouse to store the equipment, gas to fuel it, plane tickets, and accommodation during the five month wave season in Nazaré, plus any other expenses including (yet not limited to) promotional and marketing efforts or other unforeseen expenses, we are aiming to raise $18,000. 

Of course, this is just our goal for the first season of documenting Nazaré, with hopes to increase awareness in the years to come. Our projections require a goal of raising $450,000 USD, which would be used towards:

1. Creating a surf academy, where we will give youth the training tools they need to surf and perform water safety in big waves. 

2. Increasing awareness through public speaking at events and schools. 

3. Working with foundations to give back and inspire all involved. 

4. Involving the best of the big wave surf community to participate in this project. 

What you get:

In return for your contributions, we are offering; t-shirts, signed posters, tow surf boards, wetsuits, life jackets, and an all expenses paid trip to come experience the set up and execution of these plans. Most importantly, in return for your contributions your name will be mentioned in the credits of our productions as co-producers; as well as, any other creative ways that we can acknowledge you in helping us to launch this sport to the next level. 

The Impact

This project will change the world and the people responsible for making this change will get to take that credit with them into their personal and professional lives. 

By documenting this wave and the risk takers who challenge it, we will be impacting the future of our sport and pushing the limits in creating timeless wonder for all those involved. 

Risks & Challenges

I have been sponsored for fifteen years as a professional athlete. The first for five years as a downhill mountain biker, and now for the past ten years as a professional tow  surfer. 

Through this passion to succeed, companies like Coca Cola and Kraft Foods have taken risks in sponsoring me and have benefitted greatly. However, I am now ready to take the personal risk in surfing the biggest wave in the world and to represent new companies who are willing to invest in extreme projects such as this. 

Big wave surfing creates a focus unlike any other; however, as waves of this magnitude only break during certain times of the year and almost always in far and exotic locations, it is difficult for big wave surfers to travel from one swell to the next without proper sponsorship. And it is only recently that luxury companies like Mercedes have entered as investors due to the shared interests of creating an impact larger than any previous extreme sport. This isn’t just surfing, this is surfing at the ultimate level - this is surfing Nazaré. 

The challenges involved in getting this project up and running are physical, mental, financial, and logistical. The team at Project Nazaré views these challenges in a positive light, as we are comprised of an experienced team with traditional family values. This means that we will push and train each other physically and mentally to achieve our goals, and all we need in return is for you to join our team in helping to take care of the financial and logistical aspects. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Everything I know, represent, and love revolves around surfing, and it is a lifestyle I wish to pass on to younger generations - starting with my two girls - who look up to me and depend on me for further inspiration and support. That alone as motivation, means that following through is the only option, and I trust that you will be able to relate on some level or another the importance of building foundations for our youth.

Of course, here at Nazaré Productions, we understand that helping financially isn’t the only way in which you can add your support. You can also help us get the word out and make noise about our campaign through word of mouth and social media efforts.

Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools (located at the top left hand side of the page), and help us to promote our cause through Facebook, Twitter, Email, Google+, etc. Remember; your support, both financial and moral, is the most valuable asset we have. 

Thank you for reading this, and we look forward to your support in the future of big wave surfing, and Nazaré Productions. 

Sincerely, 

-David Langer and the Crew at Nazaré Productions

The challenges involved in getting this project up and running are physical, mental, financial, and logistical. The team at Project Nazaré views these challenges in a positive light, as we are comprised of an experienced team with traditional family values. This means that we will push and train each other physically and mentally to achieve our goals, and all we need in return is for you to join our team in helping to take care of the financial and logistical aspects. 


Other Ways You Can Help


Everything I know, represent, and love revolves around surfing, and it is a lifestyle I wish to pass on to younger generations - starting with my two girls - who look up to me and depend on me for further inspiration and support. That alone as motivation, means that following through is the only option, and I trust that you will be able to relate on some level or another the importance of building foundations for our youth.


Of course, here at Nazaré Productions, we understand that helping financially isn’t the only way in which you can add your support. You can also help us get the word out and make noise about our campaign through word of mouth and social media efforts.


Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools (located at the top left hand side of the page), and help us to promote our cause through Facebook, Twitter, Email, Google+, etc. Remember; your support, both financial and moral, is the most valuable asset we have. 


Thank you for reading this, and we look forward to your support in the future of big wave surfing, and Nazaré Productions. 


Sincerely, 


-David Langer and the Crew at Nazaré Productions

story:
Join me in Building Safe Houses for abandoned kids. Look at the picture above, I took this picture a few blocks away from my house, Please note this is the kind of lives these kids are accustomed to, Hello My name is Chriszelle Dickson and my mother and I are both from South Africa and quit our jobs last year in order to open a Little Feet’s Safe House for abandoned kids on the West Rand in Johannesburg. We have had this Passion for over five years and even went as far as building a shelter, however, with limited funds only so much can be achieved.

The Little Feet's Project remains an important source of revenue, as our organization depends on outsourced funds. We face a constant battle in terms of growing and setting the plan in motion. About three years ago, we inherited a property and decided to use it as the Little Feet’s Safe House. We started renovating and building it to make it a suitable and safer living space.

Our Mission is to make a difference in the lives of children that come from unbearable circumstances. These children may find themselves in abusive surroundings or be taken away from their parents by social structures, due to inadequate funds to raise these kids. Too many children come from HIV & Aids infested backgrounds. Too many go to bed hungry daily. Too many have no place to call home and too many go through this life feeling enraged, disappointed, and completely let down by the world.

We believe that we do not have to do something big to make a small change. We plan to operate a hot lunch kitchen, which will provide hot meals to the community on a daily basis. We plan to take in abandoned (took out the word any) children of all ages and provide short term housing for them, whilst we source loving homes to take them in to. We plan to be able to provide medical care and a safe home for orphaned babies and children.

Your small change does make a difference in our lives. With a continuous struggle in the fight against HIV and AIDS, we will join this fight by providing decent Medicare and assistance to those in need. Please make a donation and watch your funds make a difference. Just like a tree that grows from the ground up, we promise to make you proud and feel like you are making a difference. Let us show you how a little can make up for a whole lot. Thank you for your consideration.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Nick Webbe.  I was divorced a few years ago.  It was a bad time.  As I struggled with the emotional and practical difficulties I thought about how I could help others in the same circumstances.  Then I wanted to help them to rebuild and make the transition to a better and more fulfilling life. 

I created the website www.mylifeafterdivorce.com to do just that, to help both men and women navigate the divorce process and cope better with their new and unfamiliar life after divorce.

The site deals openly and honestly with all aspects of divorce from legal and financial matters, through new relationships to the many aspects of everyday life which can be difficult for the newly single.     

The advice is honest, straight forward and authoritative.  It is accompanied by numerous links to other trusted specialist websites who have particular expertise in the subject being discussed.

Nearly half of all marriages and long term relationships end in breakdown.  This leaves a trail of damaged lives and broken families.

With your support we can continue to expand what we can do to help divorced people achieve a better life. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise £7,000 to achieve a number of things.  Firstly we will carry out further research into the causes of the downgrade to our search engine ranking produced by changes Google has made to their search algorithms.  We are not alone as these changes are having dramatic effects upon the rankings of many websites both large and small.

Like them we must have a clear understanding of the causes so we can make the necessary adaptations to take into account these algorithm changes.  This will be vital element in returning us to our previous high search engine rankings.  This work is budgeted at £2,000.

We will then build upon this to maintain these crucial search engine ranking and so return the site to its former status of the website of choice for divorced people.  This will be achieved by effective Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) involving the development of further unique forms of content and a new Social Media strategy with a more interactive implementation.  This work is budgeted at £2,500 

As soon as we have completed this vital work we will continue the work we have started in preparing a US version of the site.  This will be our next key objective to bring a straight forward, unbiased, optimistic source of support and help to the divorced community in the United States.  This will take time but then we can look towards helping people in Australia, Canada and other English speaking countries.  

The problems of relationship breakdown are universal so almost all of our content will need only simple adjustment to make it appropriate for US visitors.  The legal information and advice will require complete overhaul to reflect the US divorce laws which are peculiar to individual states.  This work is budgeted at £2,500.

Your contributions are crucial and will allow us to reach a wider audience and give more help and support to people and families at a very difficult and critical time in their lives.  To thank you for your help and support we would like to offer you a small token of our appreciation for your kindness and generosity.

We have thought a lot about this.  Most perks are gifts of the product or service that the funds are being raised to produce.  That's difficult for us as everything we create is freely available on the website.  After much thought we had a great idea - 'decision' dice.

Life is full of important decisions whether you are single, married, in a partnership or, yes divorced.  Making these decisions is so much easier with advice and support.  That's the real help we offer divorced people but just for the light hearted fun of it you could role our specially designed 'decision' dice and there you have it, the answer.  No more stress!

    

The Impact

The breakdown of marriages and long term relationships shows no sign of a decline and could affect half of us during the course of our lives.  Unfortunately the chance of breakdown ending a second marriage is even greater.  
The need for realistic and  straight forward advice and support plus easy access to serious professional help will always be there.  Our goal is to make a difference to people's lives, to make divorced people happier and better able to make the transition to their new life.

Risks & Challenges

The major challenge for the site is to re-establish the high search engine rankings to deliver the visitor levels we achieved before the adverse algorithm changes.  We have budgeted a modest monthly expenditure to do this in the long term.  As visitor numbers increase the revenue aspects of the site will generate the funds to finance these costs.

Other Ways You Can Help

We want to spread the word about what we are doing and why it's so important to be able to help and support men and women during and after divorce.  Indiegogo have a number of tools that help you do this.

story:
Who We Are

  Vibrant Vital Water was established by founder Randy Hatton in 1999. Randy started commercial fishing with his father at an early age and at 26 became captain of a 175 foot catcher/processor fishing vessel in the Bering Sea.                                  


  Randy became aware of and concerned about the amount of chemicals and garbage entering the oceans, rivers, and lakes. At age 33, he quit his lifelong commercial fishing career to dedicate his life to coming up with solutions to these problems.
  Randy has spent the last 15 years researching the properties of water, experimenting with and testing the effects of different treatment systems on it. He integrated the information, developing leading edge technologies to improve the physical and bio-energetic qualities of planetary water preserves.
He established Vibrant Vital Water, a company with a small scale operation making all the products below. To help support our environmental concerns we must take production to the next level on all 4 systems, starting with the Vortex Magnetic Energizer. We have been issued 3 patents with 2 pending. Randy's vision is to create sustainable community-based businesses where 10% of profits go towards
 Project Clean Oceans Inc., a 501(c)(3) non-profit.

               What We Need and What You Get

  We need at least $90,000 to make 2,500 Vortex Magnetic Energizer (VME) kits. Donations and sales from the perks will pay for tooling, materials, labor and packaging for 2,500 VME kits. The VME's and Harmony Rings will be handmade, with Love and Integrity, creating jobs for people not machines. 

              

                      Vortex Magnetic Energizer


               The VME kits and other perks offered are the simplest and most affordable way to transform your drinking water. For a detailed description and research about the   VME, Harmony Rings and other perks offered, visit our website and click on products.  http://www.vibrantvitalwater.com/vme.htm  

  

    


 The VME, along with the limited edition Gaia's Fountain and Artesia, are highlighted in the book Dancing With Water: The New Science of Water. It explains how and why each of the water technologies/perks that we offer really work.

  These technologies are all about revitalizing, renewing, and preserving earth's most precious and vital resource: Water. By supporting this campaign you will be supporting better health for You, your Family, your Environment, and all Beings for future generations.


                                    The Problem

  Every 5 minutes, over 2 million plastic water bottles are sold in the US alone, and many bottled water companies rake in 280,000% profit. Many of these plastic bottles are getting into the waterways of the planet. Bottled water cost 2000 times more than tap water, has a high level of Oxidation Reduction Potential (O.R.P), is acidic, low in conductivity, electrons, magnetism, oxygen, and hydrogen, and lacks a balance of ionic trace minerals. This is why 95% of people are dehydrated, and even those drinking plenty of water are experiencing dehydration symptoms. Most people are not efficiently and effectively getting nutrients into their cells and flushing out toxins due to lack of good quality water.               


                                    The Solution

  We live in a time when nearly every problem has a solution. If we invest in a good quality water filter to remove physical contaminants, half of the job is done. Then we add quality ionic trace minerals, use the natural water activation (Vortex Magnetic Energizer Kit) to remove vibrational contaminants and to restructure and energize our drinking water.

For a small investment, 10-15 cents per gallon, you can transform bottled and tap water to full-spectrum living water  with balanced levels of minerals, hydrogen, oxygen, electrons, conductivity, and pH.

                       "Vortex Magnetic Energizer"

         

   This simple tool satisfies three of the four elements required for the creation of full-spectrum, living water.  As its name indicates, the Vortex Magnetic Energizer creates a vortex while water passes through a field-reversing magnetic array and Harmony Ring. Within minutes, it transforms lifeless water into full-spectrum, living water.

The process causes water dipoles to align/realign, creating greater molecular organization and restoring the water’s liquid crystalline state. The significance of this simple process (passing through the combination of vortex, reversing magnetic field, and Harmony Ring) is becoming well recognized. Research shows that the structure of water is more important than its chemical composition.     


          Scientific Evidence of the Vortex Effect

            


 "Comprehend nature, then copy nature." -Viktor Schauberger

  The qualities of vortex water were best described by Viktor Schauberger, a brilliant Austrian inventor and naturalist, in the book Living Energies. He established evidence of the vast difference between "dead water" and "living water." Dead water is still water, such as bottled, tap, or distilled. Living water, he taught, is like the water found in springs and rivers that forms spirals as it flows. This causes higher zeta potentials (life force) ionization, oxygenation, hydrogen, electrons, and also kills parasites and bacteria. 

 Further research was recently conducted by Dr. Mu Shik Jhon of Korea. He showed that in a vortex the inner layers of water flow much faster than the outer layers, and that the velocity at the center of the vortex is infinite. The hydrogen bonds in the water molecules begin to stretch as layers expand and contract. This opens the molecular structure of water for a constant interchange and exchange of electrons. As hexagonal structuring increases, the water's ability to carry vibrations and frequency also increases. Dr. Jhon's 30 years of research on water was compiled in his book The Water Puzzle and the Hexagonal Key: Scientific Evidence of Hexagonal Water and its positive influence on health! 


     Scientific Evidence of the Magnetic Effect

 The use of magnetism to revitalize and purify water is not new. Ancient Romans were among the first to utilize the Earth’s magnetic properties with their system of aqueducts, designed to purify and energize water. Some recent innovators have confirmed the health benefits of magnetic therapies and uses, including Dr. Mu Shik Jhon, Johann Grander, and Walter Rawls, Jr. Ph.D., as well as Dr. Gerhard Pioch.

 Dr. Gerhard Pioch discovered that chemical wastes in the body can be washed out by using magnetically treated water. Contaminants deposited into the body, such as medications, fertilizers, food-borne chemicals, pesticides (including traces of DDT), and heavy metals can be neutralized by the magnetized water treatments. 

Other research revealed:
  1. Increase in hydrogen ion activity
  2. Decrease in water weight
  3. Decrease in quantity of nitrogen dissolved in water
  4. Increase in the number of crystallization center


                               Harmony Rings

  Originally discovered by Slim Spurling in the 1980s and known as Tensor Rings, Harmony Rings have a powerful effect on water and on living biology. In addition to their effects on water, Tensor Rings have been used to augment plant growth and vitality, to reduce pain and inflammation, and hasten healing.

In testing, demonstrated effects on water include increased vitality, a change from acid to neutral or slightly alkaline pH, and allowing better oxygen/nutrient/waste transport in and out of cells. Plants given this water appear to be taller and more lush, have larger leaves, and are less attacked by pests.                                                


                             How Does It Work?

  Water is energized by movement and by turbulence. When water moves, it  naturally spirals, breaking away from each obstacle with a spin (vortex). As water spirals through the VME, groupings of unorganized water molecules break apart and realign again and again, generating the repeating matrix known as structured or liquid crystalline water.

Each time the water spins through the magnetic array, a greater degree of coherence is established. When the water stops, the geometric pattern (water’s organized molecular structure) remains. Rare earth elements such as Shungite and ANCHI Crystals will amplify this structure-generating process.


      What other products will be coming soon?


                          "Varuna"

    Designed for medium/small volumes of full-spectrum, living water

               





                  "Gaia's Fountain"  

          Designed for larger volumes of full-spectrum, living water

    

   The vortex, or spiral, is the underlying pattern which permeates our universe; the pattern formed by two opposing forces is made visible in the substance of water. All life moves between two polarities; without opposite poles there can be no attraction and no repulsion. Without attraction and repulsion, there can be no movement, and without movement, no life.
 All that lives moves between an upward spiral - levitation energy, creating growth and purification, and the downward spiral - gravity degeneration towards death. In nature both forces always work in cooperation with one another, creating balance.


                  

 The vortex action of water (implosion) produces electricity and has been measured in lab tests. This is a complex interplay of "vibration," "direction," and "force," each balanced both internally and externally. Humanity has lived for so long under the spell of reductive science that it now requires totally new ways of understanding and perceiving in order to come to terms with the existence and power of this energy.

                                                  

                                          "Artesia"                  

           An integrated system for functional art, pools & spas,                  

           hydroponics, agriculture, aquaculture, rivers and lakes

 

          

                 

   Water is a network of hydrogen-bonded molecules. It can form various structures, depending on how the individual molecules bond together. The most recent scientific findings indicate that biological organisms prefer the six-sided (hexagonal) ring-structure, found in spring water.

 

  This Hexagonal water forms a liquid crystalline lattice that is involved in cellular communication, intracellular water movement, enzyme function, and many other metabolic processes. The amount of Hexagonal water in the body has been correlated with aging. It has also been found to form the initial layer of water surrounding healthy cells. On the other hand, unorganized water has been described surrounding diseased and abnormal cells.

                               

               "Artesia" Pool & Spa

 Dehydration is the number one cause of stress in the human body. It has been linked with heartburn, headaches, angina pain, asthma, colitis, diabetes, peptic ulcer pain, high blood pressure, low back pain, blood cholesterol, and many other symptoms. In fact, it is not just the overall lack of water, but specifically the lack of hydrogen and oxygen found in full-spectrum, living water, which is now being correlated with disease.

      

  


 The most recent scientific findings indicate that water forms 3 distinct layers surrounding healthy cells. In healthy tissues, full-spectrum, living water is closely associated with cell membranes, forming the first layer. On the other hand, the initial layer surrounding diseased cells is unorganized water. Full-spectrum, living water is also found in close association with normal, healthy DNA, while abnormal DNA is associated with unorganized water. 

      

              Artesia - Hydroponics             

           

       

          Substantial difference in plant and vegetable growth rate,                     potency and size when using full-spectrum, living water.



    



        The Environmental Problems

  The plastic pollution of our oceans is becoming a situation that must be addressed. The governments of the world are turning their heads away from this most serious problem. 200 millions of tons of plastics have entered the world's oceans; an estimated 8 million tons of plastic enters them each year. 

     


       This Whale had over 20 kilos (44 lbs.) of plastic in its stomach.

   Some plastics take 400 to 700 years to decompose (it's not known exactly how long), yet some eventually sinks to the bottom. Every year over 1 million sea birds and 100,000 marine animals - Turtles, Dolphins, Whales - die from plastic ingestion.

 

                     In some of the 5 major Gyres of the world,        

          there's over 100 x more plastic particles than plankton.

 Toxic chemicals (including PCBs and DDTs) are absorbed by the plastics, increasing the toxic concentration a million times. Lantern fish along with many other species of fish in the oceans are eating this plastic, thinking it's food.   

    

 After entering the food chain, these persistent organic pollutants bio-accumulate throughout the food chain. Health effects linked to these chemicals include cancer, malformation, and impaired reproductive ability. Biologist are finding that some species of baby male fish are reverting to female due to high levels of estrogen in their systems. Plastic pollution is also a carrier of invasive species, threatening the native ecosystems.   


    The Solution to Clean Our Oceans   

              


 The health of our global waterways and our own health are intertwined; the connection is undeniable. We the people must make protecting our oceans, 72% of our planet, top priority. It is imperative to remove pollution and stop the flow of it entering our great oceans which give us so much life. 



                          The Vision Alignment

                                             A Vision for Clean Oceans

 One of the main principles of the Intention Process, perhaps the most important, is to see the end result from the beginning - to hold a vision in our mind of the final outcome. We invite you to join us in focusing on the solutions and letting go of the conditions. The dynamics of how this works are simple when we have learned that our thoughts are the forerunners of our future. As we hold the thought of our desired outcome, combined with taking action, it has to manifest for us.

Accordingly, we are holding the template for clean, pure water in every body of water on this planet, humanity having risen to the call, pristine water everywhere now and forevermore.  We ask you to join us in holding this vision.

 


               Project Clean Oceans, Inc., a 501(c)(3) Non-Profit                      

       Created to Clean and Revitalize the Waterways of the World

 Technology invented by Randy Hatton called the "Great Ocean Garbage Collector" is designed to remove large volumes of garbage from our oceans efficiently, effectively, and with the least harm to sea creatures.

  Randy's deep love for and passion to give back to the oceans has given him the incentive. And his 35 years of commercial fishing experience, working on the most advanced, large scale fisheries in the world and gaining knowledge (from nearly every fishery in existence), has given him the expertise to carry it out, 

 This is one of the most important projects on the planet. It will create jobs, remove and stop billions of pounds of garbage, mainly plastic, from entering the oceans of the world. And it will prevent millions of innocent beings in the oceans from facing an unnecessary death.

   This will take place on ships with a similar design to large scale (Mid-Water Trawl) commercial fishing vessels, called catcher/processors. The "Great Ocean Garbage Collectors" will be strategically placed in the most concentrated areas, efficiently and effectively catching the garbage.

 After the garbage is hauled aboard the ship it will be sorted on conveyer belts, instantly returning any living species back to the ocean. "Grade A Plastic" will be turned into fuel and "Grade B Plastic" turned into modular blocks for building materials.


 Because they are equipped with the most advanced plasma technology, turning plastics into fuel, while in port the ships can also relieve local landfills of plastic waste. For more detailed info : www.vibrantvitalwater.com/pco/index.htm


Ten precent of all sales from Vibrant Vital Water LLC, go towards supporting Project Clean Oceans Inc, 501 (3)(c). With your help, this vision will become a reality: the largest scale ocean garbage cleanup in existence and most important for the health and well-being of all life in the oceans, our children, and future generations to come.                     

                           Together We Can and Will Do This!


                       Other Ways You Can Help

 Together with a shared vision and intentions of respect and appreciation towards the oceans of the world, we can and will succeed. Without water, there would be no life. It is the medium for miraculous transformation, the mother of all life.

 If you would like to join this mission, please feel free to contact us at: info@projectcleanoceans.org

                What We Need and What You Get
  






  We need at least $90,000 to make 2,500 Vortex Magnetic Energizer 
(VME) kits. Donations and sales from the perks will pay for tooling,
 materials, labor and packaging for 2,500 VME kits. The VME's and Harmony 
Rings will be handmade, with Love and Integrity, creating jobs for 
people not machines. 
               

                      Vortex Magnetic Energizer 

               The VME kits and other perks offered are the simplest and most affordable way to transform your drinking water. For a detailed description and research about the   VME, Harmony Rings and other perks offered, visit our website and click on products.  http://www.vibrantvitalwater.com/vme.htm   
   
     
 The VME, along with the limited edition Gaia's Fountain and Artesia, are highlighted in the book Dancing With Water: The New Science of Water. It 
explains how and why each of the water technologies/perks that we offer really work.

  These technologies are all about revitalizing,
renewing, and preserving earth's most precious and vital resource: Water. By supporting this campaign you will be supporting better health for 
You, your Family, your Environment, and all Beings for future generations.


                                    The Problem 
  Every 5 minutes, over 2 million plastic water bottles are sold
 in the US alone, and many bottled water companies rake in 280,000% 
profit. Many of these plastic bottles are getting into the waterways of the planet. Bottled water cost 2000 times more than tap water, has a high 
level of Oxidation Reduction Potential (O.R.P), is acidic, low in 
conductivity, electrons, magnetism, oxygen, and hydrogen, and lacks a balance
 of ionic trace minerals. This is why 95% of people are dehydrated, and even those drinking plenty of water are experiencing dehydration 
symptoms. Most people are not efficiently and effectively getting nutrients into their cells and flushing out toxins due to lack of good 
quality water.                

                                    The Solution 


  We live in a time when nearly every problem has a solution. If we 
invest in a good quality water filter to remove physical 
contaminants, half of the job is done. Then we add quality ionic trace 
minerals, use the natural water activation (Vortex Magnetic 
Energizer Kit) to remove vibrational contaminants and to restructure and 
energize our drinking water.
 For a small investment, 10-15 cents per 
gallon, you can transform bottled and tap water to full-spectrum living water  with
 balanced levels of minerals, hydrogen, oxygen, electrons, 
conductivity, and pH. 
                       "Vortex Magnetic Energizer" 

          
   This simple tool satisfies three of the four elements
required for the creation of full-spectrum, living water.  As its
name indicates, the Vortex Magnetic Energizer creates a vortex while water passes
through a field-reversing magnetic array and Harmony Ring. Within minutes, it
transforms lifeless water into full-spectrum, living water. 

The process causes water dipoles to align/realign, creating greater
molecular organization and restoring the water’s liquid crystalline
state. The significance of this simple process (passing through the combination of vortex, reversing
magnetic field, and Harmony Ring) is becoming well recognized. Research shows that the structure of water is more important than its chemical composition.     

          Scientific
Evidence of the Vortex Effect            

 "Comprehend nature, then copy nature." -Viktor Schauberger

  The qualities of vortex water were best described by Viktor Schauberger, a brilliant Austrian inventor and naturalist, in the book Living Energies. He established evidence of the vast difference between "dead water" and "living water." Dead water is still water, such as bottled, tap, or distilled. Living water, he taught, is like the water found in springs and rivers that forms spirals as it flows. This causes higher zeta potentials (life force) ionization, oxygenation, hydrogen, electrons, and also kills parasites and bacteria.  
 Further research was recently conducted by Dr. Mu Shik Jhon of Korea. He showed that in a vortex the inner layers of water flow much faster than the outer layers, and that the velocity at the center of the vortex is infinite. The hydrogen bonds in the water molecules begin to stretch as layers expand and contract. This opens the molecular structure of water for a constant interchange and exchange of electrons. As hexagonal structuring increases, the water's ability to carry vibrations and frequency also increases. Dr. Jhon's 30 years of research on water was compiled in his book The Water Puzzle and the Hexagonal Key: Scientific Evidence of Hexagonal Water and its positive influence on health!  




     Scientific
Evidence of the Magnetic Effect

 The use of
magnetism to revitalize and purify water is not new. Ancient Romans were among
the first to utilize the Earth’s magnetic properties with their system of aqueducts,
designed to purify and energize water. Some recent innovators have confirmed
the health benefits of magnetic therapies and uses, including Dr. Mu Shik Jhon, Johann Grander, and Walter Rawls, Jr. Ph.D., as well as Dr. Gerhard Pioch.
 Dr. Gerhard Pioch discovered that chemical wastes in the body can be washed out by
using magnetically treated water. Contaminants deposited into the body, such as
medications, fertilizers, food-borne chemicals, pesticides (including traces of
DDT), and heavy metals can be neutralized by the magnetized water treatments. Other research revealed:
Increase
     in hydrogen ion activity
Decrease
     in water weight 

Decrease
     in quantity of nitrogen dissolved in water
Increase
     in the number of crystallization center




                               Harmony Rings

  Originally discovered by Slim Spurling in the 1980s and known as Tensor Rings, Harmony Rings have a
powerful effect on water and on living biology. In addition to their effects on water, Tensor Rings have been
used to augment plant growth and vitality, to reduce pain and inflammation, and hasten healing. 
 In testing, demonstrated effects on water include increased vitality, a change from acid to neutral or slightly alkaline pH, and allowing better oxygen/nutrient/waste transport in and out of cells. Plants given this water appear to be taller and more lush, have larger leaves, and are less attacked by pests.                                                 

                             How Does It Work? 

Water
is energized by movement and by turbulence. When water moves, it 
naturally spirals, breaking away from each obstacle with a spin (vortex). As
water spirals through the VME,
groupings of unorganized water molecules break apart and realign again and
again, generating the repeating matrix known as structured or liquid crystalline
water. Each time the water spins through the magnetic array, a greater degree
of coherence is established. When the water stops, the geometric pattern (water’s organized
molecular structure) remains. Rare earth elements such as Shungite and ANCHI Crystals will amplify this structure-generating process.      What other products will be coming soon?
                          "Varuna"
    Designed for medium/small volumes of full-spectrum, living water                
                  "Gaia's Fountain"  
          Designed for larger volumes of full-spectrum, living water

     
   The vortex, or spiral, is the underlying pattern
which permeates our universe; the pattern formed by two opposing forces is made
visible in the substance of water. All life moves between two polarities;
without opposite poles there can be no attraction and no repulsion. Without
attraction and repulsion, there can be no movement, and without movement, no
life. All that lives moves between an upward spiral - levitation energy, creating growth and purification, and the downward spiral - gravity degeneration towards death. In nature both forces always work in
cooperation with one another, creating balance. 
                    
 The vortex action of water (implosion) produces
electricity and has been measured in lab tests. This is a complex interplay of
"vibration," "direction," and "force," each balanced both internally and externally. Humanity has lived for so
long under the spell of reductive science that it now requires totally new ways
of understanding and perceiving in order to come to terms with the existence
and power of this energy.
                                                   
                                          "Artesia"                   

           An integrated system for functional art, pools & spas,                   

           hydroponics, agriculture, aquaculture, rivers and lakes
                             

   

Water is a network of
hydrogen-bonded molecules. It can form various structures, depending on how the
individual molecules bond together. The most recent scientific
findings indicate that biological organisms prefer the six-sided (hexagonal)
ring-structure, found in spring water.




 

  This Hexagonal water forms a
liquid crystalline lattice that is involved in cellular communication,
intracellular water movement, enzyme function, and many other metabolic
processes. The amount of Hexagonal water in the body has been correlated
with aging. It has also been found to form the initial layer of water
surrounding healthy cells. On the other hand, unorganized water has been described
surrounding diseased and abnormal cells.
                                

               "Artesia" Pool & Spa 

 Dehydration is the number one
cause of stress in the human body. It has been linked with heartburn, headaches, angina
pain, asthma, colitis, diabetes, peptic ulcer pain, high blood pressure, low back
pain, blood cholesterol, and many other symptoms. In fact,
it is not just the overall lack of water, but specifically the lack of hydrogen and oxygen found in full-spectrum, living water,
which is now being correlated with disease.
          


 The most recent scientific findings
indicate that water forms 3 distinct layers surrounding healthy cells. In
healthy tissues, full-spectrum, living water is closely associated with cell membranes,
forming the first layer. On the other hand, the initial layer surrounding
diseased cells is unorganized water. Full-spectrum, living water is also
found in close association with normal, healthy DNA, while abnormal DNA is
associated with unorganized water. 


       

              Artesia - Hydroponics               
           


        

          Substantial difference in plant and vegetable growth rate,                     potency and size when using full-spectrum, living water.


             The Environmental Problems
  The plastic pollution of our oceans is becoming a situation that must be addressed. The governments of the world are turning their heads away from this most serious problem. 200 millions of tons of plastics have entered the world's oceans; an estimated 8 million tons of plastic enters them each year. 

      
       This Whale had over 20 kilos (44 lbs.) of plastic in its stomach.

   Some plastics take 400 to 700 years to decompose (it's not known exactly 
how long), yet some eventually sinks to the bottom. Every year over 1 
million sea birds and 100,000 marine animals - Turtles, Dolphins, Whales -
 die from plastic ingestion.
  

                     In some of the 5 major Gyres of the world,        
          there's over 100 x more plastic particles than plankton.




 Toxic chemicals (including PCBs and DDTs) are absorbed by the plastics, increasing the toxic concentration a million times. Lantern fish along with many other species of fish in the oceans are eating this plastic, thinking it's food.   
    

 After entering the food chain, these persistent organic pollutants bio-accumulate throughout the food chain. Health effects linked to these chemicals include cancer, malformation, and impaired reproductive ability. Biologist are finding that some species of baby male fish are reverting to female due to high levels of estrogen in their systems. Plastic pollution is also a carrier of invasive species, threatening the native ecosystems.   

   
The Solution to Clean Our Oceans    

               
 The health of our global waterways and our own health are intertwined; the connection is undeniable. We the people must make protecting our oceans, 72% of our planet, top priority. It is imperative to remove pollution and stop the flow of it entering our great oceans which give us so much life.  




                          The Vision Alignment 
                                             A Vision for Clean Oceans
 One of the main principles of the Intention
Process, perhaps the most important, is to see the end result from the
beginning - to hold a vision in our mind of the final outcome. We invite you to join
us in focusing on the solutions and letting go of the conditions. The
dynamics of how this works are simple when we have learned that our
thoughts are the forerunners of our future. As we hold the thought of our desired outcome, combined with taking action, it has to manifest for
us.

Accordingly, we are holding the template for clean, pure water in every
body of water on this planet, humanity having risen to the call, pristine water everywhere
now and forevermore.  We ask you to join us in holding this vision. 

 



               Project Clean Oceans, Inc., a 501(c)(3) Non-Profit                       

       Created to Clean and Revitalize the Waterways of the World

 Technology invented 
by Randy Hatton called the "Great Ocean Garbage Collector" is designed to 
remove  large volumes of garbage from our oceans efficiently, effectively, and with the least harm to sea creatures. 
  Randy's deep love for and passion to give back to the oceans has given him the incentive. And his 35 years of commercial fishing experience, working on the most advanced, large scale fisheries in the world and gaining knowledge (from nearly every fishery in existence), has given him the expertise to carry it out,  


 This is one of the most important projects on the planet. It will 
create jobs, remove and stop billions of pounds of garbage, mainly plastic, from entering the oceans of the
 world. And it will prevent millions of innocent beings in the oceans from facing an unnecessary death. 

   This will take place on ships with a similar design to large scale (Mid-Water Trawl)
 commercial fishing vessels, called catcher/processors. The "Great Ocean Garbage Collectors" will be strategically placed in the most concentrated areas, efficiently and effectively catching the garbage. After the garbage is hauled aboard the ship it will be sorted on 
conveyer belts, instantly returning any living species back to the 
ocean. "Grade A Plastic" will be turned into fuel and "Grade B Plastic" 
turned into modular blocks for building materials.
 Because they are equipped with the most advanced plasma technology, turning plastics into fuel, while in port the ships can also relieve local landfills of plastic waste. For more detailed info : www.vibrantvitalwater.com/pco/index.htm
Ten precent of all sales from Vibrant Vital Water LLC, go towards supporting Project Clean Oceans Inc, 501 (3)(c). With your help, this vision will become a reality: the 
largest scale ocean garbage cleanup in existence and most important 
for the health and well-being of all life in the oceans, our children, and future generations to come.                      
                           Together We Can and Will Do This!
                          Other Ways You Can Help
 Together
with a shared vision and intentions of respect and appreciation towards the oceans of the world, we can and will succeed. Without water,
there would be no life. It is the medium for miraculous transformation, the
mother of all life.
 If you would like to 
join this mission, please feel free to contact us at: 
info@projectcleanoceans.org

story:
The Tree of Life Farm Project is an organic, open door CSA farm, living environmental art project, permaculture and sculpture garden. It is based on the belief that our Earth is a living entity. It will be created with the intention to heal the land and all living beings on the land. This farm is the first and more will come throughout the years to heal the Earth in many other places as well, and to give the opportunity to others to care for a spiritual farm as this one, so you can become a spiritual gardener too. The various farm designs follow sacred geometry patterns and spiritual symbols that have healing properties on the landscape. The first one will be in the shape of the Tree of Life.

This garden will stretch out on 1 acre land. The garden will consists of a greenhouse for seedlings and tropical plants, winding walking path around outdoor raised beds and hugel rows, a farm stand, a drying/packaging shed, a chicken coop, goat pen and bee hives. We need help purchasing the greenhouse, fencing, tools and additional soil, manure and compost for starting up the farm.

The nature path that winds throughout the farm will be a beautiful, quiet and tranquill place to walk around on with benches, environmental friendly art and spots to meditate or relax. We will offer CSA for the community and an option to just grab a willow basket and walk around and pick what you want while you walk in between the plant medicines, the farm animals, honeybees, fruit trees and special plant varieties. 

The farm will be built mainly with hugelkultur mounds, an old Austrian farming technique. These mounds will be incorporated into the vegetable and herb raised beds both inside & outside the greenhouse. It is based on water conservation methods by burying wood under the soil mounds that will break down during the years, feeding the soil and acting as a water reserve for the plants above the ground.

What the CSA will offer:

-Biodynamic grown fresh and dried herbs, vegetables, mushrooms and fruits locally, with an optional mail option for dried herbs and mushrooms, seeds and on the farm produced oils and tinctures.

-Locally produced seeds from plants that were grown from Strictly Medicinal Seeds, Siskiyou Seeds, both Oregon seed companies.

-Farm visits with basket herb & flower picking for families with children as a wholesome family activity. Members can choose to walk the herb gardens and pick their own herbs and/or receive a CSA box of herbs & more at harvest times. Members and the public can pick up tinctures, infused olive/coconut oils, dried herbs/teas, free samples, newsletter, wish list/suggestions for future herbs/veggies/fruit/flowers to grow.

-Worm compost will be also available.

-And from the second year honey from the bees on the farm.
The actual map of the farm:

You can find more information about us, daily updates and progress on our Facebook page @ https://m.facebook.com/hugelwarriors/ and Kati's website @ http://Katalinpazmandi.com.

Please check the exciting perks, what you will get back for your contribution on this project. Thank you all for listening, donating and participating in this dream! Please share this indiegogo fundraiser with your friends! See you all in the garden!

Love & Hugs, 

Brian, Kati, Bo & Coconut

story:
Short Summary​

Cornerstone Athletics of New Mexico was created by Randy Macias. It is a all girls youth sports organization.  About 5 years ago I began coaching for a  youth girl's basketball city league and saw a true need to have sports opportunities for young girls sports. After coaching year after year, I began to see how eager and developmental basketball was to these girls in all aspects of life and how unfortunate it was that they did not have places to play that were truly devoted to them.  Many leagues and camps have them put together with boys youth sports and they often felt left out and intimated. I wanted them to see and feel the real power of unity, sportsmanship and competition. This begins with being rooted in the community and creating a strong positive presence in their neighborhoods. Starting here in my community of Rio Rancho New Mexico and expanding out though the state and country. Becoming a true movement.

Our goal with this campaign is to raise funds needed for a dedicated facility. A facility that will allow us to:

  • Host games and tournaments
  • Events
  • Community Outreach
  • Player Development
  • Youth fitness personal training
  • Personal Development
  • Year-round sports
  • Community Franchise needs such as healthy eating and fitness gym

Currently as we set a plan for startup, forecasts show we are only able to rent time at an existing facility for 2 hours a week and host small pickup games. But we  fall short on real development of our girls in the community. Missing almost all our key points in making an impact to our youth girls.

You as a Contributor can help reach this milestone.  Having a dedicated girls youth organization available to them that focuses on providing youth sports for young ladies to develop, grow, play and build unity and friendship. Contributions that will provide a spark to a movement bringing that hometown feel back to the communities, neighborhoods and spreading across the country. It starts with one contribution at a time. Through consistency, hard work and perseverance, Cornerstone Athletics can make a difference, one girl at a time.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our Campaign is set to raise $40,000.  This will give us the funds to lease a space for 6 months, lay down a quality floor and provide equipment for training and gameplay.
  • Our Perks are awesome!  We will offer unique t-shirts, hoodies, and workout gear.  All with our Cornerstone Athletics logo and motivational phrases.  These items will be exclusive to this campaign and not sold in our merchandise store.  Other awesome perks include personalized shirts with your name or company name, your name/logo on our floor where all the fans, families and members can see and building sponsors.  We will also display the names of all contributors on a mural inside our facility. 
  • All contributors will be invited to a special "pre-grand opening" at the facility prior to opening.
  • All perks include free shipping. We're happy to send your items anywhere in the U.S. We pick up the shipping as a thank you for any contribution!
  • We need YOU to help us reach our goal. This is the first milestone.  All funds in the campaign weather we reach our goal or not will be applied to our phase 1 plan. 

 

The Impact

The impact on our communities, neighborhoods and cities alike is monumental.  Investing in our youth, is investing in our future! 

Did you know that by the age of 17, 51% of girls will have quit sports and 7 out of 10 girls who quit sports by 17 didn’t feel like they belonged? Nearly that same number felt that society doesn’t encourage girls to play sports.

According to the Women’s Sports Foundation by the age of 14 girls are dropping out of sports at twice the rate of boys and lastly sixty-one percent of female executives said sports contributed to their career success.

That’s why we are here.  Cornerstone is here to make a change in the lives of our youth girls. With changes in these numbers we can have lasting impact on our society. To be part of that is truly making a difference. If we can leave things better than we found them, that is the essence of generational change! 

Risks & Challenges

If we don't meet our goal things could take a little longer to complete as we will have to continue the hardwork for funding.  August could become September etc.., Either way, our youth community is worth it!  We will get there.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are very excited for everyone to be a part of Cornerstone Athletics and this campaign. We could not be successful without you. We know not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Spread the word about Cornerstone to your family, friends, and everyone you can. Share the Indiegogo link, on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and anyway you can. Good news travels fast!
