story:
A Company for People

Love the Cookie. Own the Nookie.

It’s simple really. It’s not just a cookie company. It’s a love company. A social enterprise. We want to sell cookies, help people and make them happy. We are a company committed to having a positive social, environmental and transformational impact and to the well being of all people.

I am asking for your contribution to bring this vision to life. To bring it to you, to bring it to the world.

“What matters is not the mere fact that we lived. What matters is the difference we made.” Nelson Mandela

 

What is Nookie?

It’s the best cookie ever. It’s Raw, Vegan, Organic, Gluten Free, Grain Free, Paleo, Sprouted, Dehydrated, Sweetened with Whole Foods and Handmade with Love

Ingredients: cashews, almonds, walnuts, pumpkin seeds, coconut, goji berries, cacao nibs, dates, banana, ground vanilla bean, Himalayan salt.

Nookie is the marriage of food, art and sensuality ~ your Raw Beauty. We are breaking the taboos of what a food product should be. We are disrupting conventions as a company and as a way of living. We are uncompromising in who we are and our products.

“You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete. “ Buckminster Fuller.

 

I am inviting you to help me turn this vision into reality.

 

I have an amazing product people love and lots of opportunity for sales. What I need is capital to set-up the company and produce cookies on a large scale.

This will take $50,000.

If you help make this vision a reality you will receive my undying gratitude and the experience that you helped give birth to a great company that makes a difference. Whether or not you participate in this campaign you will be enjoying Nookie in the not to distant future.

Thank you. And thank you for who you are for the world.

Love, Melanie

 

“If it doesn’t shake up the industry or isn’t fun to do, then it doesn’t get launched.” Sir Richard Branson
story_txt:
A Company for People
Love the Cookie. Own the Nookie.
It’s simple really. It’s not just a cookie company. It’s a love company. A social enterprise. We want to sell cookies, help people and make them happy. We are a company committed to having a positive social, environmental and transformational impact and to the well being of all people.
I am asking for your contribution to bring this vision to life. To bring it to you, to bring it to the world.
“What matters is not the mere fact that we lived. What matters is the difference we made.” Nelson Mandela
 
What is Nookie?
It’s the best cookie ever. It’s Raw, Vegan, Organic, Gluten Free, Grain Free, Paleo, Sprouted, Dehydrated, Sweetened with Whole Foods and Handmade with Love
Ingredients: cashews, almonds, walnuts, pumpkin seeds, coconut, goji berries, cacao nibs, dates, banana, ground vanilla bean, Himalayan salt.
Nookie is the marriage of food, art and sensuality ~ your Raw Beauty. We are breaking the taboos of what a food product should be. We are disrupting conventions as a company and as a way of living. We are uncompromising in who we are and our products.
“You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete. “ Buckminster Fuller.
 
I am inviting you to help me turn this vision into reality.
 
I have an amazing product people love and lots of opportunity for sales. What I need is capital to set-up the company and produce cookies on a large scale.
This will take $50,000.
If you help make this vision a reality you will receive my undying gratitude and the experience that you helped give birth to a great company that makes a difference. Whether or not you participate in this campaign you will be enjoying Nookie in the not to distant future.
Thank you. And thank you for who you are for the world.
Love, Melanie
 
“If it doesn’t shake up the industry or isn’t fun to do, then it doesn’t get launched.” Sir Richard Branson

story:
Tough Bone Tuning Solution

What else...?

Für unsere Deutschsprachigen Freunde... ganz unten... ;-)

2400km further would u come...
U would save 240l of Diesel...
And save 384.- on a trip of 8000km!!!
With 420kg. functionel and aerodynamics lighter the driving pleasure and the Off-Road capability is mind blowing...
Is this benefit enough 4 u?
Than have a look...
Team Tough Bone

The Idea

Lightweight off-road vehicles take you further. Rally vehicles prove it: Weight is crucial. That makes the vehicle suitable for all kinds of terrain and resource-saving. We have applied that principle to travel vehicles and we have even gone one step further: Wherever it is possible, one component should have several functions. 
In that way, we provide:
  • Savings in weight, material and money
  • Healthy and environment-friendly progress
  • Multifunctionality
  • More pleasant driving and greater off-road capability
  • An economic and ecological path

The Concept

Our innovative approach saves 400kg of unnecessary load in off-road vehicles! We pay special attention to the construction, i.e. to what is installed, who installs it and in what way. This results in lightweight construction-elements, which are usable and functional several times. Through the selected route, we will show that this concept works.
LET`S DO SOME EPIC SHIT... because the solution is already there!

The Goals:

1.   To raise 120,000.-- Doller and make the Concept Car "Tough Bone Defender" suitable for exhibition, in order to attain the production stage and prepare the vehicle for our expeditions.
2.   It shall be exhibited at:
  • Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon, Race Course, England, September 2015
  • Adventure Northside, Travel and Survive World Wide, Walsrode, Germany, October 2015
  • Adventures and 4-Wheel Entertainment, Bad Kissingen, Germany, June 2016
             
  

The Challenge

The idea and the concept are trendy. For that reason, we should be able to meet the demands for healthier and easier traveling. We work with partners and people, who equally have rethinking in their heart. Another challenge is the production of materials that cannot be always made as environmentally friendly as we would like. We are striving to give our best for the environment and to become even better, because we are involved in other projects related to health and environmental issues.

Super cool perks

Take a look of our past perks ... ;-)
  • There are postcards of our cool ventures
  • Functional Tough Bone Key Chain with shining eyes ...
  • Member of the Hall of Fame
  • A limited edition (50 pcs) of Flaska bottles with your name
  • Tough Bone kick-off when reaching the target amount, including campfire, steaks and music.

Have we awaken your interest?

Tough Bone

Tough Bone Tuning Solution is a young, freaky garage workshop, which was proudly inscribed at the Commercial Register in June 2013. We manufacture functional lightweight structures on off-road vehicles. Our field of specialization includes the manufacture of carbon-made components in serial, individual and special production, as well as the installation of polycarbonate disks, solar systems, lithium batteries and sophisticated interior fittings made of carbon and Cordura. We work with guys and girls who identify 100% with the project. Our concept breathes of our love for engines and diesel, the wind, many off-road miles, observations on off-road vehicles and, last but not least, our experience in the racing field. So we know what we are talking about… ;-)
IT`S A PLAYGROUND 4 BAD-ASS WARRIORS...

The man behind it

Sisley Kaltenbach - A man full of vision and thirst for action. The life of Sisley has always been characterized by the spirit of adventure, the desire for extreme situations and the struggle for the achievement of physical and sport goals. His body, will and mental forced have been sharpened, steeled and formed by more than 15 years of experience as a professional athlete, during which he won several Swiss, European and World titles of snowboard, mountain bike, strainflex, Ju Jitsu and Karate, as well as by 15 years as High-Risk level bodyguard, in the service of renamed people from show business, economics and politics. During this time, Sisley coached several Olympic champions, World Cup participants and professional athletes. His adventurous spirit led him to all corners of the world as an athlete and a professional. The accumulated experience made Sisley a Survival Freak with comprehensive and tactic vision. His motivation is to find adventure even in the smallest things. His vision is to bring his way of life closer to people and to pass it on. Besides Tough Bone, he also owns the companies Face Line and Seal Tac Functional Coaching. Sisley`s unusual everyday winter activities consist not only in skiing, but also in teaching snowboard lessons, traveling through the Haute Route from Zermatt to Chamonix and climbing high mountains, such as Mont Blanc. In summer, surfing, survival training and personal care have priority. From time to time, he may also participate in an Ironman. Given that he enjoys life with nature and the environment as his permanent companions, he created the super cool Sea2Mountain Label, by which he deals with the issue of waste mountains and the way to decimate them. His life motto is:
BE THAT KIND OF PERSON WHEN YOUR FEET HIT THE FLOOR EACH MORNING THE DEVIL SAYS „OH CRAP…“
Sisley Kaltenbach
The Dude

Land Rover Defender 110 TD5

The Defender is cult! A myth that makes you dream of freedom. We introduced our Tough Bone Concept Car in 2014 and 2015, together with the first innovative lightweight elements, at the exposition "Adventures and 4-Wheel Entertainment" in Bad Kissingen. The Defender made a monstrous impression! The reaction of professionals, visitors and the media was huge. The enhancement of the Defenders with carbon elements lithium batteries and polycarbonate offers unparalleled opportunities as a "light-version", which represents an absolute novelty in the Off-Road general market. With this idea, it is possible to serve three markets, the luxury, expedition and rally segments. It is an off-road travel vehicle that has no equal.

Why do we need a lightweight construction?

Weight is decisive for the use, performance, comfort, autonomy and wear of Off-Roaders. By using a functional lightweight structure, we achieve less material-entrainment and fuel consumption, lower material wear, increased off-road capability, greater range, higher load capacity, a more economical power delivery and better driving characteristics, combined with perfect design. That is the dream of every Off-Roader.

Material


When choosing materials, Carbon presents outstanding properties. By "carbon" we mean a carbon-fiber-reinforced plastic. It combines the properties of titanium and aluminum in many of our components. Therefore, we rely on this powerful and versatile raw material. Carbon, offers opportunities that could not be reached totally or partially with the materials used until now. It is extremely light, durable, resistant to external influences and individually adjustable. That means that it can be produced at will as malleable, slip-resistant, puncture-resistant, smooth or extremely resilient. It is no longer possible to imagine technical excellence without carbon.

Examples

A walkable and loadable roof: Normally, the roof is equipped with an aluminum checker plate or with a roof rack. A carbon element reduces greatly the overall weight. Due to this weight decrease, the center of gravity is set lower, which is a huge advantage for all types of vehicles, especially for off-road vehicles. Aerodynamics do not change; there is no noise and huge quantities of fuel are saved.
Windows and doors: Glass panels and inner parts are replaced with carbon or other polycarbonate. The plates are enormously resistant to puncture, impact and abrasion. They cannot be dented and offer visual and sun protection. The Carbon door panels save weight and generate new storage space outside.
Chassis parts: Hoods, doors, roof and side panels usually have large areas, which are heavy and corrode. Thanks to the use of lightweight carbon fiber, corrosion is something that belongs to the past. In addition to that, the center of gravity of the vehicle is greatly lowered towards the floor what the off-road capability, which hugely improves off-road capability and agility.
Underbody protection and bottom plate: The metal plates used until now are heavy and may corrode. Carbon, however, is much lighter and does not corrode, which is a great advantage during expeditions. The panels are largely resistant to puncture, impact and abrasion. Metal is formed by beating. After exposure to a load, carbon resumes its original shape.
Interior: Every interior is a matter of taste and it is individually adjusted. With the help of carbon, a car can be made luxurious or practical. The nice surface appearance of the material and its design possibilities make any coating unnecessary.
Technical parts of the chassis and engine: In particular, moving and rotating parts follow the principle of mass and inertia. The lighter they are, the faster they accelerate or decelerate. When moving and rotating, heavy components are sluggishly. Light parts make the vehicle agile, lively and powerful. In that way, the wear of parts is significantly reduced.

Requirements

The expectations of a customer from his vehicle are as individual as the owner himself, no matter that it is a luxury, expedition, travel, fun or rally vehicle. We offer the chance to try different approaches and alternatives, as well as to successfully implement wishes and ideas for every kind of off-road vehicle: Land Rover, Jeep, Mercedes, Toyota, Nissan, Unimog, Ford, MAN, Iveco, VW etc. The modifications are exclusive and customer-oriented designs.

Products

We guarantee the excellent quality of any product that has been developed, built and converted by Tough Bone Tuning Solution. We work closely with specialists, drive testers and craftsmen. All elements have been developed by Tough Bone and tested under extreme conditions. Made in Switzerland.

Funding

People will always travel, but the way they do it depends on their individual views and preferences. Functional lightweight construction and ecological energy production are the principles that enable us to support not only entertainment, but also our health. In addition to that, we contribute to relieving our natural environment. It is important to us that this idea might spread like wildfire and be used in both, everyday life and private activities. Imagine what it would be like, if all types of vehicles were built with this approach!
That is why we need your support, so that we might achieve these goals:
1.   To raise 120,000.-- Doller and make the Concept Car "Tough Bone Defender" suitable for exhibition and attain the production stage.
2.   Exhibitions at:
  • Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon, Race Course, England, September 2015 www.adventureoverlandshow.com
  • Adventure Northside, Travel and Survive World Wide, Walsrode, Germany, October 2015 www.adventure-northside.com
  • Abenteuer & Allrad, Bad Kissingen, Germany, June 2016 www.abenteuer-allrad.de

We can come up with a clear and visible concept and get started. Do you find this idea supercool? Check out our perks and tell your friends and fellows about them. Post as many of them as you can and wish - anywhere.

I count on you, make it happen… ;-)

Summary of costs:

Tough Bone elements
Development of plans, creation forms, production of elements and bags, installation. The preparation of the carbon, titanium and aluminum elements is expensive in the prototype version.
50,000.--
Mechanics
As we develop Concept Car into an extraordinary travel vehicle, the engine, transmission, suspension, brakes and electronics are adapted, optimized and replaced, partially or completely. After that, the vehicle will be equipped as it may be necessary for the road and the field.
25,000.--
Adventures and 4-Wheel Entertainment
Exhibition, preparation, materials, lodging and food.
3,000.--
Advertising
Graphics, advertising, internet, inscription, print and work. These are smaller positions but of great importance for the success of good public relations.
4,000.--
Buffer
In case of contingencies and possible repairs, reserves and rewards, it is nice to have a good cushion ;-)
18,000.--
Tax and Fees
We have to calculate with 10% Tax and Fees, the coming of Indiegogo, Banks and Taxes.
10`000.-
If we do not collect the 120`000.- Doller within 40 days, we will have to proceed step by step. Completion would be lengthy and we would be exposed tot the risk of competition. The provided funds will be directed to the project and we will remain on course. There is no question about that.
 

Media relations

We have already done a lot regarding media relations. The following links contain some photos and videos. Check them out! I look forward for your feedback.

Our Partners

Delta Bags: www.delta-bags.com
K-Carbon www.k-carbon.ch
Grossmann Maschinenbau www.grossmann-maschinenbau.ch
Abenteuer 4x4 Reisen www.abenteuer4x4.com
OVERLAND 4tec AG Technics www.overlandtechnics.ch
Famous Water www.famous-water-shop.com
Connova AG Composite www.connova.com
Corsetti Engineering www.davidecorsetti.com
Plastics 4 Performance: www.plastics4performance.com
Tibus Offroad Engineering: www.killeraxles.com
LEAB Power Systems www.leab.ch
4x4 Tyres www.4x4tyres.co.uk

What else can you discover?

Seal Tac
www.seal-tac.ch


Sea2Mountain
www.sea2mountain.ch


FaceLine
www.faceline.ch


Shape your Body
www.shape-your-body.ch


Together we are strong... Thanks 4 your time.

Sisley Kaltenbach the Dude
CEO from Tough Bone Tuning Solution

___________________________________________________

___________________________________________________


Tough Bone Tuning Solution

What else...?

2400km further would u come...
U would save 240l of Diesel...
And save 384.- on a trip of 8000km!!!
With 420kg. functionel and aerodynamics lighter the driving pleasure and the Off-Road capability is mind blowing...
Is this benefit enough 4 u?
Than have a look...
Team Tough Bone

Die Idee

Ein leichter Off-Roader bringt dich weiter. Rally Fahrzeuge beweisen es: Gewicht ist matchentscheidend. Es macht ein Fahrzeug geländetauglicher und ressourcenschonender. Dieses Prinzip übertragen wir auf Reisefahrzeuge und wir gehen sogar noch einen Schritt weiter: Wo immer möglich soll ein Bauteil mehrere Funktionen haben.
Damit erreichen wir:
  • Eine Ersparnis an Gewicht, Material und Geld
  • Ein umwelt- und gesundheitsschonendes Vorankommen
  • Multifunktionalität
  • Mehr Fahrspass und grössere Geländetauglichkeit
  • Wir sind ökonomischer und ökologischer unterwegs

Das Konzept

Unser innovatives Konzept erspart Off-Road Fahrzeugen 400kg an überflüssiger Last! Wir achten beim Aufbau genau darauf, was, wie und wo wir Elemente verbauen. Daraus entstehen Leichtbau-elemente, die funktionell mehrfach nutzbar sind. Durch ausgewählte Reiserouten zeigen wir, dass dieses Konzept funktioniert. LET`S DO SOME EPIC SHIT… denn die Lösung ist bereits da!

Die Ziele:

1. To raise 120`000.- Doller, um den Conceptcar „Tough Bone Defender“ ausstellungstauglich zu machen,  Produktionsreife zu erlangen und für unsere Expeditionen einsatzbereit zu machen.
2. Ausstellen an der:
  • Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon, Racecourse in England September 2015. 
  • Adventure Northside, Reisen und Überleben weltweit in Walsrode Deutschland Oktober 2015.  
  • Abenteuer & Allrad in Bad Kissingen Deutschland Juni 2015

                  

Die Herausforderung                

Die Idee und das Konzept liegen voll im Trend. Somit sollten wir im Stande sein, der Nachfrage des gesünderen und leichteren Reisens entgegen zu kommen. Deswegen arbeiten wir mit Partnern und Menschen, denen ein Umdenken gleichermassen am Herzen liegt. Eine weitere Herausforderung ist die Herstellung der Materialien, die nicht immer so umweltfreundlich hergestellt werden können, wie wir das gerne hätten. Wir sind bestrebt das Beste für unsere Umwelt zu geben und noch besser zu werden, da wir uns auch mit anderen Projekten für den Umweltschutz und die Gesundheit einsetzten.

Super coole Perks

Schau bei unseren Perks vorbei… ;-)
  • Es gibt Postkarten von unserem coolen Unternehmen
  • Funktionelle Tough Bone Schlüsselanhänger mit leuchtenden Augen…
  • Mitglied in der Hall of Fame Eine auf
  • 50 Stück limitierte Flaska mit deinem Namen versehen
  • Tough Bone Kick-Off beim Erreichen der Summe mit Lagerfeuer, Steaks und Musik

Haben wir Dein Interesse geweckt?

Tough Bone

Tough Bone Tuning Solution ist eine junge, freakige Garagenwerkstat, die ihren Handelsregistereintrag voller Stolz im Juni 2013 bekommen hat. Wir realisieren funktionellen Leichtbau an Off-Road-Fahrzeugen. Unsere Spezialität umfasst die Herstellung von Carbon-Bauteilen in Serie, Einzel- und Sonderanfertigungen, sowie Einbauten von Polycarbonat-Scheiben, Solarsystemen, Lithium-Batterien und ausgeklügelten Innenausbauten aus Carbon und Cordura. Bei uns arbeiten Jungs und Mädels, die sich zu 100% mit dem Projekt identifizieren. Unser Konzept atmet von unserer Liebe zu Motoren und Diesel, zum Fahrtwind, vielen Off-Roadmeilen, Beobachtungen an Off-Road Fahrzeugen und last but not least Erfahrungen im Rennbereich. So we know what we are talking about… ;-)

IT`S A PLAYGROUND 4 BAD-ASS WARRIORS...

Der Mann dahinter              

Sisley Kaltenbach – Ein Mann voller Visionen und Tatendrang. Das Aussergewöhnliche, die Abenteuerlust und der Drang nach Extremen sowie der Kampf um das Erreichen körperlicher und sportlicher Ziele prägen seit jeher Sisleys Leben. Über 15 Jahre als Profisportler, in denen er im Snowboard, Mountain Bike, Strainflex, Jiu Jiutsu und Karate mehrere Schweizermeister-, Europameister- und Weltmeister-Titel errang, sowie 15 Jahre als Personenschützer im High Risk Level, die durch das  Betreuen und Schützen namhafter Grössen aus Show Business, Wirtschaft und Politik geprägt waren, schliffen, stählten und formten seinen Körper, seinen Willen und seine mentale Stärke. Während dieser Zeit trainierte Sisley mehrere Olympia-Sieger, Worldcup-Teilnehmer und Profisportler. Seine Abenteuerlust brachte ihn sportlich und beruflich an alle Ecken der Welt. Die gesammelten Erfahrungen machen Sisley zu einem umfassenden, taktisch denkenden Survival Freak. Seine Motivation besteht darin, das Abenteuer in noch so kleinen Dingen zu finden. Seine Vision ist es, den Menschen seine Lebensart näher zu bringen und weiterzugeben. Neben Tough Bone ist er ausserdem auch Inhaber der Firmen FaceLine und Seal Tac Functional Coaching. Sisley`s ungewöhnlicher Alltag im Winter besteht nebst dem Ski- und Snowboardunterricht auch mal darin sich auf die Haute Route von Zermatt nach Chamonix zu begeben und dort auf Berge wie den Mont Blanc zu Kraxeln. Im Sommer haben dann Surfen, Survival Trainings und persönliche Betreuungen Priorität oder dazwischen ab und zu auch mal ein Ironman. Weil ihm das Leben Spass macht und dabei die Umwelt und die Natur sein stetiger Begleiter sind, hat er zusätzlich das super coole Sea2Mountain Label in die Welt gerufen, das sich mit dem Thema Abfallberg und wie man diese dezimieren kann, beschäftigt. Sein Lebensmotto lautet:
BE THAT KIND OF PERSON WHEN YOUR FEET HIT THE FLOOR EACH MORNING THE DEVIL SAYS „OH CRAP…“
Sisley Kaltenbach
The Dude

Land Rover Defender 110 TD5

Der Defender ist Kult! Ein Mythos, der von Freiheit träumen lässt. Unser Tough Bone Conceptcar stellten wir schon 2014 und 2015 mit ersten innovativen Leichtbau-Elementen bei der Abenteuer & Allrad Messe in Bad Kissingen zur Schau. Der Defender hinterliess einen monströsen Eindruck! Die Resonanz von Fachleuten, Besuchern und Medien war riesig. Der Ausbau des Defenders mit Carbon-Elementen, Lithium Batterien und Polycarbonat bietet unvergleichliche Chancen, da eine „light-Version“ im Off-Road Breiten-Markt ein absolutes Novum wäre. Mit dieser Idee können gleich drei Märkte bedient werden: Das Luxus- das Expeditions- und Rally-Segment. Ein Off-Road Reisefahrzeug, das seinesgleichen sucht.

Warum Leichtbau

Das Gewicht entscheidet über die Nutzung, die Leistungsfähigkeit, den Komfort, die Autonomie und den Verschleiss eines Off-Roaders. Durch funktionellen Leichtbau erzielen wir weniger Material-Mitführung und Spritverbrauch, geringeren Materialverschleiss, erhöhte Geländetauglichkeit, grössere Reichweite, mehr Zuladung, ökonomischere Kraftentfaltung und Fahreigenschaften, gepaart mit perfektem Design. Davon träumt jeder Off-Roader.

Material

Bei der Materialwahl bietet insbesondere Carbon hervorragende Eigenschaften. Carbon ist ein kohlenstofffaser-verstärkter Kunststoff. Er vereint bei vielen unserer Bauteile die Eigenschaften von Titan und Aluminium. Deshalb setzen wir auf diesen leistungsfähigen und vielseitig einsetzbaren Rohstoff. Carbon, bietet Möglichkeiten, die bis anhin verwendete Materialien nicht oder nur teilweise erreichen konnten. Extrem leicht, strapazierfähig und gegen äussere Einflüsse beständig und individuell gestaltbar. Das heisst, dass es je nach Wunsch als formbar, rutschfest, stichfest, glatt oder extrem belastbar produziert werden kann. Carbon ist bei technischen Höchstleistungen nicht mehr weg zu denken.

Beispiele

Begeh- und beladbares Dach: Normalerweise wird das Dach mit einem Aluminium-Riffelblech oder mit einem Dachträger versehen. Ein Carbon-Element verringert das Gesamtgewicht erheblich. Durch diese Gewichtsreduktion in der Höhe kommt der Schwerpunkt tiefer zu liegen, was für alle Arten von Fahrzeugen insbesondere aber für Offroad-Fahrzeuge von enormem Vorteil ist. Die Aerodynamik verändert sich nicht, keinerlei Geräuschentwicklung kommt auf und spart Unmengen an Sprit.

Fenster und Türen: Glasscheiben, und Innenleben werden durch das leichte Carbon- und oder Polycarbonat ersetzt. Die Platten sind enorm stich-, schlag- und abriebfest, können nicht eingedrückt werden und bieten einen Sicht- sowie Sonnenschutz. Die Carbon Türverkleidungen sparen Gewicht und generieren neuen Stauraum nach aussen.

Karosserie Teile: Motorhauben, Türen, Dach und Seitenbleche haben meist grosse Flächen, sind schwer und korrodieren. Durch den Einsatz von leichtem Carbon gehört die Korrosion der Vergangenheit an. Ausserdem wird der Körperschwerpunkt des Fahrzeuges erheblich Richtung Boden gesenkt, was die Geländetauglichkeit, das Wiegeverhalten und die Agilität enorm verbessert.

Unterbodenschutz und Bodenblech: Die bisher verbauten Metallplatten sind schwer und können korrodieren. Carbon hingegen ist wesentlich leichter und korrodiert nicht, was auf Expeditionen nur von Vorteil sein kann. Die Platten sind enorm stich-, schlag- und abriebfest. Bei Schlägen verformt sich Metall. Das Carbon nimmt nach einer Belastung wieder seine Ursprungsform an.

Innenausbau: Jeder Innenausbau ist Geschmacksache und individuell gestaltbar. Mit Carbon kann das eigene Auto luxuriös oder zweckmässig ausgebaut werden. Die schöne Oberflächenoptik des Materials und die Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten machen eine Verkleidung weitgehend unnötig.

Technische Fahrwerks- und Motorenteile: Insbesondere bewegliche und rotierende Teile folgen dem Masse- und Trägheitsprinzip. Je leichter diese sind desto schneller werden sie beschleunigt, bzw. abgebremst. Schwere, bewegliche und rotierende Bauteile bewegen sich träge. Leichte hingegen lassen das Fahrzeug in seiner Charakteristik agiler, spritziger und leistungsfähiger werden. Somit wird deren Verschleiss sowie jener weiterer Fahrzeugteile erheblich gesenkt.

Ansprüche

Die Ansprüche eines Kunden an sein Fahrzeug sind so individuell wie die Besitzer selbst. Egal ob es ein Luxus-, Expeditions-, Reise-, Fun- oder Rallyfahrzeug wird. Wir bieten die Möglichkeit verschiedene Konzepte und Alternativen, Wünsche und Ideen erfolgreich umzusetzen. Für jedes Off-Road-Fahrzeug: Land Rover, Jeep, Mercedes, Toyota, Nissan, Unimog, Ford, MAN, Iveco, VW usw. Die Umbauten sind exklusive, kundenorientierte Sonderanfertigungen.

Produkte

Auf jedes Produkt, das von Tough Bone Tuning Solution entwickelt, verbaut und umgerüstet wurde, garantieren wir eine hervorragende Qualität. Wir arbeiten eng mit Spezialisten, Reiseerprobten und Handwerkern zusammen. Alle Elemente wurden von Tough Bone entwickelt und unter extremen Bedienungen getestet. Made in Switzerland.

Funding

Der Mensch wird immer reisen. Wie er das tut, hängt von seinen individuellen Ansichten und Vorlieben ab. Mit diesem Konzept des funktionellen Leichtbaus, gepaart mit ökologischer Energiegewinnung, unterstützen wir nicht nur die Spassseite, sondern auch unsere Gesundheit. Zudem entlasten wir unsere Natur und Umwelt. Es liegt uns am Herzen, dass sich diese Idee wie ein Lauffeuer verbreitet und sich die Industrie und Private auch zu nutzen machen. Stellt euch vor, alle Arten von Fahrzeugen würden mit dieser Einstellung gebaut werden! Deshalb brauchen wir deine Unterstützung, damit diese Ziele erreicht werden können:
1.  To raise 120`000.- Dollar, um den Conceptcar „Tough Bone Defender“ ausstellungstauglich zu machen und Produktionsreife zu erlangen.
2.  Ausstellen an der:
  • Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon, Racecourse in England September 2015 www.adventureoverlandshow.com
  • Adventure Northside, Reisen und Überleben weltweit in Walsrode Deutschland Oktober 2015 www.adventure-northside.com
  • Abenteuer & Allrad in Bad Kissingen Deutschland Juni 2016 www.abenteuer-allrad.de

So können wir mit einem klaren und sichtbaren Konzept aufwarten und loslegen. Du findest die Idee super cool? Check out our Perks und erzähle deinen Freunden und Mitmenschen davon. Poste sie so viel du kannst und du willst - überall. 

I count on you, make it happen… ;-)

Zusammenstellung der Kosten:

Tough Bone Elemente
Pläne erarbeiten, Formen erstellen, Elemente und Taschen produzieren und verbauen. Die Herstellung der Carbon, Titan und Aluminium-Elemente sind in der Prototypen-Version teuer.
50`000.-
Mechanik
Da wir den Conceptcar zu einem ausserordentlichen Reisefahrzeug ausbauen, werden Motor, Antrieb, Fahrwerk, Bremsen und Elektronik angepasst, optimiert und teilweise oder ganz ersetzt. Dazu kommt die Ausstattung, die ein solches Fahrzeug auf Reisen und im Gelände benötigt.
25`000.-
Abenteuer und Allrad
Ausstellung, Vorbereitung, Material, Übernachtung und Essen.
3000.-
Werbung
Grafik, Werbung, Internet, Beschriftung, Druck, Arbeit und coole Gadgets. Das sind kleinere Positionen, die jedoch von grosser Bedeutung für das Gelingen einer guten PR sind.
4000.-
Puffer

Tax and Fees
Wir müssen mit etwa 10% Tax und Fees rechnen, die von Indiegogo, Banken und Steuern weggehen.
10`000.-
Wenn wir die 120`000.- Doller nicht innert 40 Tagen raisen, müssen wir Step by Step gehen. Die Fertigstellung würde sich langwieriger gestalten und durch die Konkurrenz gefährdet werden. Die erbrachten Finanzmittel werden weiterhin in das Projekt fliessen und wir bleiben trotzdem dran - keine Frage.

story_txt:
Tough Bone Tuning SolutionWhat else...? 

Für unsere Deutschsprachigen Freunde... ganz unten... ;-)
2400km further would u come... U would save 240l of Diesel... And save 384.- on a trip of 8000km!!! With 420kg. functionel and aerodynamics lighter the driving pleasure and the Off-Road capability is mind blowing... Is this benefit enough 4 u? Than have a look... Team Tough Bone
The Idea
Lightweight off-road vehicles take you further. Rally vehicles prove it: Weight is crucial. That makes the vehicle suitable for all kinds of terrain and resource-saving. We have applied that principle to travel vehicles and we have even gone one step further: Wherever it is possible, one component should have several functions. 
In that way, we provide:
Savings in weight, material and money

Healthy and environment-friendly progress
Multifunctionality
More pleasant driving and greater off-road capability
An economic and ecological path

The ConceptOur innovative approach saves 400kg of unnecessary load in off-road vehicles! We pay special attention to the construction, i.e. to what is installed, who installs it and in what way. This results in lightweight construction-elements, which are usable and functional several times. Through the selected route, we will show that this concept works. LET`S DO SOME EPIC SHIT... because the solution is already there!The Goals: 
1.   To raise 120,000.-- Doller and make the Concept Car "Tough Bone Defender" suitable for exhibition, in order to attain the production stage and prepare the vehicle for our expeditions. 2.   It shall be exhibited at:
Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon, Race Course, England, September 2015
Adventure Northside, Travel and Survive World Wide, Walsrode, Germany, October 2015
Adventures and 4-Wheel Entertainment, Bad Kissingen, Germany, June 2016

                 The Challenge
The idea and the concept are trendy. For that reason, we should be able to meet the demands for healthier and easier traveling. We work with partners and people, who equally have rethinking in their heart. Another challenge is the production of materials that cannot be always made as environmentally friendly as we would like. We are striving to give our best for the environment and to become even better, because we are involved in other projects related to health and environmental issues.
Super cool perks 

Take a look of our past perks ... ;-)
There are postcards of our cool ventures
Functional Tough Bone Key Chain with shining eyes ...
Member of the Hall of Fame
A limited edition (50 pcs) of Flaska bottles with your name 
Tough Bone kick-off when reaching the target amount, including campfire, steaks and music.

Have we awaken your interest?
Tough BoneTough Bone Tuning Solution is a young, freaky garage workshop, which was proudly inscribed at the Commercial Register in June 2013. We manufacture functional lightweight structures on off-road vehicles. Our field of specialization includes the manufacture of carbon-made components in serial, individual and special production, as well as the installation of polycarbonate disks, solar systems, lithium batteries and sophisticated interior fittings made of carbon and Cordura. We work with guys and girls who identify 100% with the project. Our concept breathes of our love for engines and diesel, the wind, many off-road miles, observations on off-road vehicles and, last but not least, our experience in the racing field. So we know what we are talking about… ;-)IT`S A PLAYGROUND 4 BAD-ASS WARRIORS...The man behind it



Sisley Kaltenbach - A man full of vision and thirst for action. The life of Sisley has always been characterized by the spirit of adventure, the desire for extreme situations and the struggle for the achievement of physical and sport goals. His body, will and mental forced have been sharpened, steeled and formed by more than 15 years of experience as a professional athlete, during which he won several Swiss, European and World titles of snowboard, mountain bike, strainflex, Ju Jitsu and Karate, as well as by 15 years as High-Risk level bodyguard, in the service of renamed people from show business, economics and politics. During this time, Sisley coached several Olympic champions, World Cup participants and professional athletes. His adventurous spirit led him to all corners of the world as an athlete and a professional. The accumulated experience made Sisley a Survival Freak with comprehensive and tactic vision. His motivation is to find adventure even in the smallest things. His vision is to bring his way of life closer to people and to pass it on. Besides Tough Bone, he also owns the companies Face Line and Seal Tac Functional Coaching. Sisley`s unusual everyday winter activities consist not only in skiing, but also in teaching snowboard lessons, traveling through the Haute Route from Zermatt to Chamonix and climbing high mountains, such as Mont Blanc. In summer, surfing, survival training and personal care have priority. From time to time, he may also participate in an Ironman. Given that he enjoys life with nature and the environment as his permanent companions, he created the super cool Sea2Mountain Label, by which he deals with the issue of waste mountains and the way to decimate them. His life motto is:BE THAT KIND OF PERSON WHEN YOUR FEET HIT THE FLOOR EACH MORNING THE DEVIL SAYS „OH CRAP…“Sisley KaltenbachThe DudeLand Rover Defender 110 TD5

The Defender is cult! A myth that makes you dream of freedom. We introduced our Tough Bone Concept Car in 2014 and 2015, together with the first innovative lightweight elements, at the exposition "Adventures and 4-Wheel Entertainment" in Bad Kissingen. The Defender made a monstrous impression! The reaction of professionals, visitors and the media was huge. The enhancement of the Defenders with carbon elements lithium batteries and polycarbonate offers unparalleled opportunities as a "light-version", which represents an absolute novelty in the Off-Road general market. With this idea, it is possible to serve three markets, the luxury, expedition and rally segments. It is an off-road travel vehicle that has no equal.
Why do we need a lightweight construction? 
Weight is decisive for the use, performance, comfort, autonomy and wear of Off-Roaders. By using a functional lightweight structure, we achieve less material-entrainment and fuel consumption, lower material wear, increased off-road capability, greater range, higher load capacity, a more economical power delivery and better driving characteristics, combined with perfect design. That is the dream of every Off-Roader.
Material


When choosing materials, Carbon presents outstanding properties. By "carbon" we mean a carbon-fiber-reinforced plastic. It combines the properties of titanium and aluminum in many of our components. Therefore, we rely on this powerful and versatile raw material. Carbon, offers opportunities that could not be reached totally or partially with the materials used until now. It is extremely light, durable, resistant to external influences and individually adjustable. That means that it can be produced at will as malleable, slip-resistant, puncture-resistant, smooth or extremely resilient. It is no longer possible to imagine technical excellence without carbon.
Examples
A walkable and loadable roof: Normally, the roof is equipped with an aluminum checker plate or with a roof rack. A carbon element reduces greatly the overall weight. Due to this weight decrease, the center of gravity is set lower, which is a huge advantage for all types of vehicles, especially for off-road vehicles. Aerodynamics do not change; there is no noise and huge quantities of fuel are saved. Windows and doors: Glass panels and inner parts are replaced with carbon or other polycarbonate. The plates are enormously resistant to puncture, impact and abrasion. They cannot be dented and offer visual and sun protection. The Carbon door panels save weight and generate new storage space outside.Chassis parts: Hoods, doors, roof and side panels usually have large areas, which are heavy and corrode. Thanks to the use of lightweight carbon fiber, corrosion is something that belongs to the past. In addition to that, the center of gravity of the vehicle is greatly lowered towards the floor what the off-road capability, which hugely improves off-road capability and agility.Underbody protection and bottom plate: The metal plates used until now are heavy and may corrode. Carbon, however, is much lighter and does not corrode, which is a great advantage during expeditions. The panels are largely resistant to puncture, impact and abrasion. Metal is formed by beating. After exposure to a load, carbon resumes its original shape.Interior: Every interior is a matter of taste and it is individually adjusted. With the help of carbon, a car can be made luxurious or practical. The nice surface appearance of the material and its design possibilities make any coating unnecessary. Technical parts of the chassis and engine: In particular, moving and rotating parts follow the principle of mass and inertia. The lighter they are, the faster they accelerate or decelerate. When moving and rotating, heavy components are sluggishly. Light parts make the vehicle agile, lively and powerful. In that way, the wear of parts is significantly reduced.Requirements

The expectations of a customer from his vehicle are as individual as the owner himself, no matter that it is a luxury, expedition, travel, fun or rally vehicle. We offer the chance to try different approaches and alternatives, as well as to successfully implement wishes and ideas for every kind of off-road vehicle: Land Rover, Jeep, Mercedes, Toyota, Nissan, Unimog, Ford, MAN, Iveco, VW etc. The modifications are exclusive and customer-oriented designs.Products
We guarantee the excellent quality of any product that has been developed, built and converted by Tough Bone Tuning Solution. We work closely with specialists, drive testers and craftsmen. All elements have been developed by Tough Bone and tested under extreme conditions. Made in Switzerland.
Funding

People will always travel, but the way they do it depends on their individual views and preferences. Functional lightweight construction and ecological energy production are the principles that enable us to support not only entertainment, but also our health. In addition to that, we contribute to relieving our natural environment. It is important to us that this idea might spread like wildfire and be used in both, everyday life and private activities. Imagine what it would be like, if all types of vehicles were built with this approach!That is why we need your support, so that we might achieve these goals: 1.   To raise 120,000.-- Doller and make the Concept Car "Tough Bone Defender" suitable for exhibition and attain the production stage.2.   Exhibitions at:
Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon, Race Course, England, September 2015 www.adventureoverlandshow.com



Adventure Northside, Travel and Survive World Wide, Walsrode, Germany, October 2015 www.adventure-northside.com

Abenteuer & Allrad, Bad Kissingen, Germany, June 2016 www.abenteuer-allrad.de



We can come up with a clear and visible concept and get started. Do you find this idea supercool? Check out our perks and tell your friends and fellows about them. Post as many of them as you can and wish - anywhere.
I count on you, make it happen… ;-)

Tough Bone elementsDevelopment of plans, creation forms, production of elements and bags, installation. The preparation of the carbon, titanium and aluminum elements is expensive in the prototype version.50,000.--MechanicsAs we develop Concept Car into an extraordinary travel vehicle, the engine, transmission, suspension, brakes and electronics are adapted, optimized and replaced, partially or completely. After that, the vehicle will be equipped as it may be necessary for the road and the field.25,000.--Adventures and 4-Wheel EntertainmentExhibition, preparation, materials, lodging and food. 3,000.--AdvertisingGraphics, advertising, internet, inscription, print and work. These are smaller positions but of great importance for the success of good public relations.4,000.--BufferIn case of contingencies and possible repairs, reserves and rewards, it is nice to have a good cushion ;-)18,000.--Tax and FeesWe have to calculate with 10% Tax and Fees, the coming of Indiegogo, Banks and Taxes. 10`000.-If we do not collect the 120`000.- Doller within 40 days, we will have to proceed step by step. Completion would be lengthy and we would be exposed tot the risk of competition. The provided funds will be directed to the project and we will remain on course. There is no question about that. Media relations

We have already done a lot regarding media relations. The following links contain some photos and videos. Check them out! Tough Bone Tuning Solution
What else...?


2400km further would u come... U would save 240l of Diesel... And save 384.- on a trip of 8000km!!! With 420kg. functionel and aerodynamics lighter the driving pleasure and the Off-Road capability is mind blowing... Is this benefit enough 4 u? Than have a look... Team Tough Bone
Die Idee


Ein leichter
Off-Roader bringt dich weiter. Rally Fahrzeuge beweisen es: Gewicht ist matchentscheidend. Es macht ein
Fahrzeug geländetauglicher und ressourcenschonender. Dieses Prinzip übertragen
wir auf Reisefahrzeuge und wir gehen sogar noch einen Schritt weiter: Wo immer möglich soll ein Bauteil mehrere
Funktionen haben.Damit
erreichen wir:

Eine Ersparnis an Gewicht, Material und Geld
Ein umwelt- und gesundheitsschonendes Vorankommen

Multifunktionalität

Mehr Fahrspass und grössere Geländetauglichkeit

Wir sind ökonomischer und ökologischer unterwegs





Das Konzept
Unser
innovatives Konzept erspart Off-Road Fahrzeugen 400kg an überflüssiger Last! Wir achten
beim Aufbau genau darauf, was, wie und wo wir Elemente verbauen. Daraus
entstehen Leichtbau-elemente, die funktionell mehrfach nutzbar sind. Durch
ausgewählte Reiserouten zeigen wir, dass dieses Konzept funktioniert. LET`S DO
SOME EPIC SHIT… denn die Lösung ist bereits da!

Die Ziele: 

1. To raise 120`000.- Doller, um den Conceptcar
„Tough Bone Defender“ ausstellungstauglich zu machen,  Produktionsreife zu erlangen und für unsere
Expeditionen einsatzbereit zu machen.2. Ausstellen an der: 
Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon,
Racecourse in England September 2015. 


Adventure Northside, Reisen und Überleben weltweit in Walsrode
Deutschland Oktober 2015.   

Abenteuer & Allrad in Bad Kissingen Deutschland
Juni 2015

                 



Die Herausforderung                

Die Idee und
das Konzept liegen voll im Trend. Somit sollten wir im Stande sein, der
Nachfrage des gesünderen und leichteren Reisens entgegen zu kommen. Deswegen
arbeiten wir mit Partnern und Menschen, denen ein Umdenken gleichermassen am
Herzen liegt. Eine weitere
Herausforderung ist die Herstellung der Materialien, die nicht immer so
umweltfreundlich hergestellt werden können, wie wir das gerne hätten. Wir sind
bestrebt das Beste für unsere Umwelt zu geben und noch besser zu werden, da wir
uns auch mit anderen Projekten für den Umweltschutz und die Gesundheit
einsetzten.

Haben wir Dein Interesse geweckt?
Tough Bone
Tough Bone
Tuning Solution ist eine junge, freakige Garagenwerkstat, die ihren
Handelsregistereintrag voller Stolz im Juni 2013 bekommen hat. Wir
realisieren funktionellen Leichtbau an Off-Road-Fahrzeugen. Unsere Spezialität
umfasst die Herstellung von Carbon-Bauteilen in Serie, Einzel- und
Sonderanfertigungen, sowie Einbauten von Polycarbonat-Scheiben, Solarsystemen,
Lithium-Batterien und ausgeklügelten Innenausbauten aus Carbon und Cordura. Bei uns arbeiten Jungs und Mädels,
die sich zu 100% mit dem Projekt identifizieren. Unser Konzept atmet von
unserer Liebe zu Motoren und Diesel, zum Fahrtwind, vielen Off-Roadmeilen, Beobachtungen
an Off-Road Fahrzeugen und last but not least Erfahrungen im Rennbereich. So we
know what we are talking about… ;-)
IT`S A PLAYGROUND 4 BAD-ASS WARRIORS...


Der Mann dahinter              



Sisley
Kaltenbach – Ein Mann voller Visionen und Tatendrang. Das Aussergewöhnliche,
die Abenteuerlust und der Drang nach Extremen sowie der Kampf um das Erreichen
körperlicher und sportlicher Ziele prägen seit jeher Sisleys Leben. Über 15
Jahre als Profisportler, in denen er im Snowboard, Mountain Bike, Strainflex,
Jiu Jiutsu und Karate mehrere Schweizermeister-, Europameister- und
Weltmeister-Titel errang, sowie 15 Jahre als Personenschützer im High Risk
Level, die durch das  Betreuen und
Schützen namhafter Grössen aus Show Business, Wirtschaft und Politik geprägt
waren, schliffen, stählten und formten seinen Körper, seinen Willen und seine
mentale Stärke. Während dieser Zeit trainierte Sisley mehrere Olympia-Sieger,
Worldcup-Teilnehmer und Profisportler. Seine Abenteuerlust brachte ihn
sportlich und beruflich an alle Ecken der Welt. Die gesammelten Erfahrungen
machen Sisley zu einem umfassenden, taktisch denkenden Survival Freak. Seine
Motivation besteht darin, das Abenteuer in noch so kleinen Dingen zu finden.
Seine Vision ist es, den Menschen seine Lebensart näher zu bringen und
weiterzugeben. Neben Tough Bone ist er ausserdem auch Inhaber der Firmen
FaceLine und Seal Tac Functional Coaching. Sisley`s ungewöhnlicher Alltag im
Winter besteht nebst dem Ski- und Snowboardunterricht auch mal darin sich auf
die Haute Route von Zermatt nach Chamonix zu begeben und dort auf Berge wie den
Mont Blanc zu Kraxeln. Im Sommer haben dann Surfen, Survival Trainings und
persönliche Betreuungen Priorität oder dazwischen ab und zu auch mal ein
Ironman. Weil ihm das Leben Spass macht und dabei die Umwelt und die Natur sein
stetiger Begleiter sind, hat er zusätzlich das super coole Sea2Mountain Label in
die Welt gerufen, das sich mit dem Thema Abfallberg und wie man diese
dezimieren kann, beschäftigt. Sein
Lebensmotto lautet:

BE THAT KIND
OF PERSON WHEN YOUR FEET HIT THE FLOOR EACH MORNING THE DEVIL SAYS „OH CRAP…“Sisley
KaltenbachThe Dude


Land Rover Defender 110 TD5




Der Defender
ist Kult! Ein Mythos, der von Freiheit träumen lässt. Unser Tough Bone Conceptcar
stellten wir schon 2014 und 2015 mit ersten innovativen Leichtbau-Elementen bei
der Abenteuer & Allrad Messe in Bad Kissingen zur Schau. Der Defender
hinterliess einen monströsen Eindruck! Die Resonanz von Fachleuten, Besuchern
und Medien war riesig. Der Ausbau
des Defenders mit Carbon-Elementen, Lithium Batterien und Polycarbonat bietet
unvergleichliche Chancen, da eine „light-Version“ im Off-Road Breiten-Markt ein
absolutes Novum wäre. Mit dieser Idee können gleich drei Märkte bedient werden:
Das Luxus- das Expeditions- und Rally-Segment. Ein Off-Road Reisefahrzeug, das
seinesgleichen sucht.

Warum Leichtbau
Das Gewicht
entscheidet über die Nutzung, die Leistungsfähigkeit, den Komfort, die
Autonomie und den Verschleiss eines Off-Roaders. Durch
funktionellen Leichtbau erzielen wir weniger Material-Mitführung und
Spritverbrauch, geringeren Materialverschleiss, erhöhte Geländetauglichkeit,
grössere Reichweite, mehr Zuladung, ökonomischere Kraftentfaltung und
Fahreigenschaften, gepaart mit perfektem Design. Davon träumt jeder Off-Roader.

Material


Bei der
Materialwahl bietet insbesondere Carbon hervorragende Eigenschaften. Carbon ist
ein kohlenstofffaser-verstärkter Kunststoff. Er vereint bei vielen unserer
Bauteile die Eigenschaften von Titan und Aluminium. Deshalb setzen wir auf
diesen leistungsfähigen und vielseitig einsetzbaren Rohstoff. Carbon, bietet
Möglichkeiten, die bis anhin verwendete Materialien nicht oder nur teilweise
erreichen konnten. Extrem leicht, strapazierfähig und gegen äussere Einflüsse
beständig und individuell gestaltbar. Das heisst, dass es je nach Wunsch als
formbar, rutschfest, stichfest, glatt oder extrem belastbar produziert werden
kann. Carbon ist bei technischen Höchstleistungen nicht mehr weg zu denken.

Beispiele
Begeh- und beladbares Dach: Normalerweise
wird das Dach mit einem Aluminium-Riffelblech oder mit einem Dachträger
versehen. Ein Carbon-Element verringert das Gesamtgewicht erheblich. Durch diese
Gewichtsreduktion in der Höhe kommt der Schwerpunkt tiefer zu liegen, was für
alle Arten von Fahrzeugen insbesondere aber für Offroad-Fahrzeuge von enormem
Vorteil ist. Die Aerodynamik verändert sich nicht, keinerlei
Geräuschentwicklung kommt auf und spart Unmengen an Sprit.


Fenster und Türen: Glasscheiben,
und Innenleben werden durch das leichte Carbon- und oder Polycarbonat ersetzt.
Die Platten sind enorm stich-, schlag- und abriebfest, können nicht eingedrückt
werden und bieten einen Sicht- sowie Sonnenschutz. Die Carbon Türverkleidungen
sparen Gewicht und generieren neuen Stauraum nach aussen.


Karosserie Teile: Motorhauben,
Türen, Dach und Seitenbleche haben meist grosse Flächen, sind schwer und korrodieren.
Durch den Einsatz von leichtem Carbon gehört die Korrosion der Vergangenheit
an. Ausserdem wird der Körperschwerpunkt des Fahrzeuges erheblich Richtung
Boden gesenkt, was die Geländetauglichkeit, das Wiegeverhalten und die Agilität
enorm verbessert.


Unterbodenschutz und Bodenblech: Die bisher
verbauten Metallplatten sind schwer und können korrodieren. Carbon hingegen ist
wesentlich leichter und korrodiert nicht, was auf Expeditionen nur von Vorteil
sein kann. Die Platten sind enorm stich-, schlag- und abriebfest. Bei Schlägen
verformt sich Metall. Das Carbon nimmt nach einer Belastung wieder seine
Ursprungsform an.


Innenausbau: Jeder
Innenausbau ist Geschmacksache und individuell gestaltbar. Mit Carbon kann das
eigene Auto luxuriös oder zweckmässig ausgebaut werden. Die schöne
Oberflächenoptik des Materials und die Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten machen eine
Verkleidung weitgehend unnötig.


Technische Fahrwerks- und Motorenteile: Insbesondere
bewegliche und rotierende Teile folgen dem Masse- und Trägheitsprinzip. Je
leichter diese sind desto schneller werden sie beschleunigt, bzw. abgebremst.
Schwere, bewegliche und rotierende Bauteile bewegen sich träge. Leichte
hingegen lassen das Fahrzeug in seiner Charakteristik agiler, spritziger und
leistungsfähiger werden. Somit wird deren Verschleiss sowie jener weiterer
Fahrzeugteile erheblich gesenkt.

Ansprüche



Die
Ansprüche eines Kunden an sein Fahrzeug sind so individuell wie die Besitzer
selbst. Egal ob es ein Luxus-, Expeditions-, Reise-, Fun- oder Rallyfahrzeug
wird. Wir bieten die Möglichkeit verschiedene Konzepte und Alternativen,
Wünsche und Ideen erfolgreich umzusetzen. Für jedes Off-Road-Fahrzeug: Land
Rover, Jeep, Mercedes, Toyota, Nissan, Unimog, Ford, MAN, Iveco, VW usw. Die
Umbauten sind exklusive, kundenorientierte Sonderanfertigungen.Produkte
Auf jedes
Produkt, das von Tough Bone Tuning Solution entwickelt, verbaut und umgerüstet
wurde, garantieren wir eine hervorragende Qualität. Wir arbeiten eng mit
Spezialisten, Reiseerprobten und Handwerkern zusammen. Alle Elemente wurden von
Tough Bone entwickelt und unter extremen Bedienungen getestet. Made in
Switzerland.

Funding

Der Mensch
wird immer reisen. Wie er das tut, hängt von seinen individuellen Ansichten und
Vorlieben ab. Mit diesem Konzept des funktionellen Leichtbaus, gepaart mit
ökologischer Energiegewinnung, unterstützen wir nicht nur die Spassseite,
sondern auch unsere Gesundheit. Zudem entlasten wir unsere Natur und Umwelt. Es
liegt uns am Herzen, dass sich diese Idee wie ein Lauffeuer verbreitet und sich
die Industrie und Private auch zu nutzen machen. Stellt euch vor, alle Arten
von Fahrzeugen würden mit dieser Einstellung gebaut werden! Deshalb brauchen
wir deine Unterstützung, damit diese Ziele erreicht werden können:1.  To raise 120`000.- Dollar, um den Conceptcar „Tough Bone Defender“ ausstellungstauglich zu machen und Produktionsreife zu erlangen.2.  Ausstellen an der:
Adventure Overland Show Stratford-upon-Avon, Racecourse in England September 2015 www.adventureoverlandshow.com 

 Adventure Northside, Reisen und Überleben weltweit in Walsrode Deutschland Oktober 2015 www.adventure-northside.com

Abenteuer & Allrad in Bad Kissingen Deutschland Juni 2016 www.abenteuer-allrad.de 


So können wir mit einem klaren und sichtbaren Konzept aufwarten und loslegen. Du findest die Idee super cool? Check out our Perks und erzähle deinen Freunden und Mitmenschen davon. Poste sie so viel du kannst und du willst - überall. 
I count on you, make it happen… ;-)Zusammenstellung der Kosten:
Tough Bone ElementePläne erarbeiten,
Formen erstellen, Elemente und Taschen produzieren und verbauen. Die
Herstellung der Carbon, Titan und Aluminium-Elemente sind in der
Prototypen-Version teuer. 50`000.-MechanikDa wir den
Conceptcar zu einem ausserordentlichen Reisefahrzeug ausbauen, werden Motor,
Antrieb, Fahrwerk, Bremsen und Elektronik angepasst, optimiert und teilweise
oder ganz ersetzt. Dazu kommt die Ausstattung, die ein solches Fahrzeug auf
Reisen und im Gelände benötigt. 25`000.-Abenteuer und AllradAusstellung,
Vorbereitung, Material, Übernachtung und Essen. 3000.-

WerbungGrafik,
Werbung, Internet, Beschriftung, Druck, Arbeit und coole Gadgets. Das sind
kleinere Positionen, die jedoch von grosser Bedeutung für das Gelingen einer
guten PR sind. 4000.-PufferFür
Unvorhergesehenes und mögliche Reparaturen, Reserve und Löhne - Es ist
angenehm, über ein gutes Polster zu verfügen ;-) 18`000.-

Tax and FeesWir müssen
mit etwa 10% Tax und Fees rechnen, die von Indiegogo, Banken und Steuern
weggehen. 10`000.-Wenn wir die
120`000.- Doller nicht innert 40 Tagen raisen, müssen wir Step by Step gehen.
Die Fertigstellung würde sich langwieriger gestalten und durch die Konkurrenz
gefährdet werden. Die erbrachten Finanzmittel werden weiterhin in das Projekt
fliessen und wir bleiben trotzdem dran - keine Frage.

Arbeit


Bei der
Medien-Arbeit haben wir schon einiges geleistet. Unter den verschiedenen Links
Fotos Videos haben wir euch so einiges zusammengestellt. Schaut`s euch an! Ich
freue mich auf euer Feedback.

story:
HAVE YOU EVER WONDERED...?

In today's food market, the products we buy have very little information about their origins, what they really contain, and how they were made or who harvested them...

Wouldn't it be great to buy products without that nagging feeling that some unethical practices have been involved in the making of it?

WHY?

We believe greater access to natural and organic supplements starts with a clean, sustainable and transparent product supply chain.

NatureSynergy is part of a new kind of industry: ecological, transparent, kind and focused on a better future. It is an opportunity to support the shift taking place globally: as the food and nutraceutical industries need to change, we want to help create that change! By conducting a business with such strong ethics and transparency, we know it will motivate others to do the same and send a message to the industry. 

VISION AND GOALS

A new product line for animals and people composed of pure plant and mineral based ingredients. Vegetarian, vegan, dairy free, organic, natural and nonGMO supplements targeting specific needs. Products are Fair Trade, sustainable, cruelty free and traceable. This business begins by having an online store with animal products and will expand to human products by next year.


HELPING OTHERS AND CARING

Once the online store is created, we will have a list of carefully selected charities and organizations who will receive a percentage of sales. The difference about how we are going to do this is that the buyer will get to choose which charity he/she wants to donate to when buying one of our product.  We have all ready started contacting organizations like Greenpeace and Amnesty International, as well as local and  International Animal Rescues


HOW:

With an enormous amount of investigative work, challenging each potential supplier with what can be regarded as crazy activist questions! We demand proof and figure out who has the most ethical transparent base plant extracts and minerals. Then we go to work and create our own blends. 


THINGS WE KNOW...

Our professional backgrounds are in Animal Science, Veterinary Medicine, Business management and Marketing, Horse Training, Human relations and Education. With over 25 years of experience in those fields, we have decided to use our knowledge to do something meaningful and create a positive impact for all and for the planet. 


The first ten blends or pure supplements we will be launching will be:

Digestive support, Calming formula, Anti inflammatory, Anti cramping, Joint support, Liver cleanse, Immune system booster and a wide range of flower frequencies essences. 


The contributors to this project will be our jump starters; sending the company into a vibrant energy. We want to use the need for natural supplements and raise awareness about child labour, modern slavery, animal rights and ecology.

"For the first time in history, human beings have become so phenomenally powerful. Empowered by technology, one person is now able to make a difference. This is why it is possible and absolutely vital to raise human consciences." 


WHAT WE NEED AND WHY

$5000 will help us launch the website and get our first order of  one raw product in and registered into the  Interim Notification Program (INP) for Low Risk Veterinary Health Products (LRVHPs)

$10 000 will help us towards marketing as well as ordering the second type of raw extract and registering it. At that stage we can do packaging ourselves. 

$15 000: A great step! We can order our third raw extract and get approved for shipping internationally! 

At $20 000 We will contract a local packaging company with excellent quality control and strict processing rules to help us with the packaging of the products in earth friendly and ecological containers. And we will launch our fourth supplement!

$30 000! Whoohooo! We can launch an other two supplements and improve our selling power and marketing strategies!

$40 000...The business is working full blast! The website and online store are complete including more charities to donate a percentage of the sales to. 

Perks: From a big Thank you to a Teaching seminar. Many perks are available for your contribution!

THE TIMING IS RIGHT!

There is a rising demand for transparency of businesses and for ethical and organic supplements! 

The main difficulties we are facing is getting all the paperwork done! We already have positive experiences with Health Canada approvals though.

Good marketing is one of the keys to our success. We are planning to give internet marketing enough means so that our exposure is maximized. Local marketing will also be done, brochures will be distributed as well as sponsoring local events and charities.

(Tee Shirts are designed! Organic Fair Trade cotton Tee's featured in some of our perks, tell us what you think!)

If you can't contribute, that's ok too, we've been there...

YOU can help us by sharing this with you friends and family, share it on your FB page, twitter, and use the Indiegogo share tools too, so that as many people as possible can see this. Thank you for caring!

Good marketing is one of the keys to our success. We are planning to give internet marketing enough means so that our exposure is maximized. Local marketing will also be done, brochures will be distributed as well as sponsoring local events and charities.

(Tee Shirts are designed! Organic Fair Trade cotton Tee's featured in some of our perks, tell us what you think!)

YOU can help us by sharing this with you friends and family, share it on your FB page, twitter, and use the Indiegogo share tools too, so that as many people as possible can see this. Thank you for caring!

story:
I know that it's often hard to get to know people on social media. So for those of you I haven't had the pleasure of getting to know well yet, here's some basics about me: I have multiple sclerosis, among other chronic, noncurable diseases (alpha 1 antytripsin deficiency, degenerative disc disease, etc.). I've had it for almost 14 years now, and it's gotten much worse over the past 4-5 years. I had been working full time as a medical transcriptionist from home, for one of the hospitals in town, all while trying to be a wife and a mom to my 3 children: a 20 year old son in college, a 15 year old son in high school, and a 7 year old daughter, now in 2nd grade. In July of 2014, I filed for short term disability with my employer. This allowed me to keep at least a partial paycheck coming in for a while and keep my benefits (or so I thought). It has been a roller coaster with the disability insurance. I am now on long term disability with them...but am only officially approved through next month. Who knows what will happen at that point. Meanwhile, that company has employed the assistance of Allsup, a company that assists people with the process of applying for Social Security disability. I got an official denial from Social Security last month after filing an application in late summer. We are appealing. Unfortunately though, possibly the *worst* part of my situation right now with my disability is that we no longer have health or dental insurance as of January 1st. The hospital would only allow me to keep it for one year from the date I began long term disability, leaving us in a very precarious situation right now.

Through all of this, my husband still hasn't found a job. He's been out of work for some time, due to various reasons, which has made it very hard to find work. He has a B.S. in Accounting from Univ. of South Alabama, plus training in medical billing and coding, but the work is either just not there, or he can't seem to get any call backs. We had been working incredibly hard on our little jewelry business that many of you have gotten pieces from (Night Walker Designs). He is the genius artist, so most of it has been left to him. My role has been increasingly limited helping out with it due to my physical situation, making it nearly impossible to keep our feet on the ledge and BEGIN what could potentially be a decent income for our family. Between the two of us- with my MS, his diabetes, BOTH of our severe depression- there just aren't hours in the day to get these things done for the business that on paper really shouldn't have taken any time at all.

Meanwhile....we're getting further behind on our bills. We've had at least two VERY close calls where we almost lost our house. We limped through Christmas and barely managed to provide a very few gifts for my youngest two children, due only to the generosity of a few angels that were sent to me. All through Christmas season, I debated whether or not to do another crowd funding campaign. I had done one a year previously, but didn't want to put anyone out, or have anyone think less of me. It was incredibly hard to do it the last time, as it is a profoundly humiliating experience. I was raised to be self-sufficient and not ask for things from people, which made it that much worse. Through many different tactics, we made it through Christmas and I had every intention of trying my hardest in the new year to figure out just what exactly we could do to keep our house.

I should mention here why it is such a big deal to me to keep this house. It's not just ANY house. This house was built in 1955, not making it officially recognizable as a "historic home", but close. My husband's parents bought the house shortly after it was built, and both he and his older brother were born and raised here. In 1999, after my husband had moved out and started a career in accounting, he came to visit his mother during lunch one day. His mother had severe COPD after years of smoking. His father was outside cutting the grass during their visit. Next thing he knew, his father had collapsed in the driveway, with the mower still running. He had suffered a major heart attack, and just like that, he was gone. Buddy Walker had been a very hard worker, and had built a career that required him to spend many days each month on the road. He had recently retired and had begun to finally enjoy some time at home, caring for his wife, who had been the love of his life since she married him in July of 1955. By this time, my husband's older brother had already married and started a family (there being a ten year gap between them), so it fell to my husband to quit his job, move back home, and care for his very elderly, ill mother. This went on for more than five years, until I came into the picture with my own brood. We dated for two years before I moved in, with the intention of marrying that year (2004). Within two months of my moving in, his mother passed away in her sleep in what is now my bedroom. It took two years for my husband to feel comfortable enough for us to move into that room (the master bed/bath). But family history, births, deaths and marriages in this old home aren't the only reasons, for me, that this house is so special. *Some* of my more intuitive friends out there may understand this better than others. The very first time I came to this house was with my now-ex-husband, who was friends with my now-husband at that time. We came over for dinner, and I IMMEDIATELY clicked with this place. I told him then how much it felt like my home....how much it reminded me of my parent's home that I was raised in. True, it does have several features that are similar to my old house. Not similar enough to explain this feeling though. I have honestly felt like this place was home, the home I had been searching for, in all my eight moves in just nine years. I told my husband when I decided to move in here with him, just before we got engaged, that he needed to be REALLY SURE about us before bringing me here, because once I moved in, he would have to "drag my cold, dead body" back out of it. This I said to a man who had never married and was himself 34 years old, coming from a 29 year old woman, mother of two, with TWO ex-husbands that I had stayed married to for only four years each! That was more than 10 years ago, and I still feel exactly the same way as I did then, never wavering even a bit, even with the ups and downs and hardships we've faced in our marriage. Don't get me wrong, I have every intention of staying married to my husband until one of us dies. But I absolutely intend for that time to be served in THIS house.

Now that you know how I feel about this house, it will not surprise you to know that I am desperate to KEEP it, and very afraid that our financial picture will make that difficult if not impossible. This poor old place is sorely in need of a LOT of repairs. As it is an older home, it seems like everything is deciding that this is a good time to start to break/chip/wear/sink/leak/etc.! But again, I stress to you that I was *not* intending on asking for help...not with the mortgage...not with any repairs.

That is until the bottom dropped out. Literally...of our bedroom ceiling. We've been dealing with leaks in the roof for approximately ten years. This house is kind of a patchwork house, which has made the roof system kind of complex. It originally started as a small ranch-style. Then there was the addition of the den and kitchen, plus patio. Then the master bedroom and bath were added. Then "the cave" was added which used to be a carport. So there are multiple roofs in certain locations, which were built one right over the other. Our hallway is the safest place in the house, having three roofs over it where several additions intersect. Unfortunately, this has left several places where there have been dips where drainage has been a challenge. My husband has to remember to get up onto the roof several times a year (which terrifies him as he is afraid of heights!) and use the leaf blower to blow all the leaves off the house. This is a huge chore, as there are multiple large oak trees on all sides of the house. Even with this, there have still been leaks in various places though. So he has gone back up over the years and done his best to patch weak spots with tar, with limited success. What truly needs to be done is for a new, whole roof to be put on, and for any problem areas to have the pitch in the rooftop raised to allow for adequate drainage of water and less buildup of fallen leaves. Ideally, some of the oak trees and/or branches would be cut as well.

So it is with great humility and desperation that I ask you all for your help. I am not expecting something for nothing however. The IndieGoGo platform offers a wonderful way for me to set up "perks" for contributions of varying sizes. For each of the perks, I have tried to set it up so that their value is worth more than the contribution amount. For example: if you donate $50, I will offer you $60 worth of merchandise from either our online Etsy store or our new website, www.nightwalkerdesigns.com.

So please, I ask you to help me save this wonderful old family home and give her a new roof that will keep us dry hopefully for many decades to come. Your generosity will be treasured by me and my family. Thank you for taking the time to read all of this!

story:
Short Summary

Hello my name is Esteban Camejo, I graduated as Industrial Technician in 1984. I was part of a team of inventors and developers for more than 10 years, and I have more than 30 years experience in the industrial mechanical market. For the past 10 years I have been involved in creating and developing several products that have helped disabled people, pregnant women, the elderly in order to make their life a little easier. 

The objective of this campaign is to raise funds to produce GWM Water Systems® equipment.

Your collaboration and support will help me introduce GWM Water Systems® equipment in the market, and I will in return help others too.   A percentage of the funds received from this campaign will be donated to organizations that help people with cancer, an orphanage and a center that helps abused women.

 Your collaboration and support will be very valuable and will help others.

Thank you for your help. God Bless You.

What We Need & What You Get

I need $250.000 USD to introduce GWM Water Systems® product in the market. The funds will be used to open an assembly facility and to pay for the production of the parts.  I have already done the entire molds to produce the parts, molds are ready to produce. The GWM Water Systems® equipment already passed the UL Laboratory test and this product is patented and it is registered mark.

We offer unique perks; all of them are made with special design, these perks are really nice and with a unique design. 

If the funds don't reach my entire goal, the funds received will be used for parts production and for donation.

The Impact

This campaign has been created to ask your support to introduce the GWM Water Systems® equipment into the market and also to help others peoples, with your contribution this project will be possible and you can make disabled persons, pregnant women, the elderly and others have their life a little easier. With your contribution you can changes the life of many people. Your contribution really help.

Risks & Challenges

Based on the actual progress of the project we are expecting very little issues or delays once the founding is completed. All the molds are already made. Our equipment already passed the test with UL laboratory, we are currently waiting for UL Laboratories do the final inspection in our facility, but we need the funds to open the facility. The final inspection could cause some delays on production if UL Laboratory have any requirements, normally every request placed by UL Laboratory becomes a priority for us and we resolve any issues within weeks

Other Ways You Can Help

Everybody can help us with our campaign, if you cannot help with a contribution, You can help by sharing with all your friend and family our campaign, you can make some noise about our campaign and you can use the Indiegogo share tools!                 You and your help have a lot of value for us.
