If we don't reach our goal, we will still use the funds to continue with the company. Any funds would help us. 
We are planning to build an office to employee Veterns as well for a special project we will be running in 8 months.    The Impact  This project is about helping people find jobs. We are planning to do a lot of community outreach and training programs for the unemployed as a company project.    Risks & Challenges  Myself and members of the team have left corporate jobs to start this project. We are living off of savings. We believe that we will be able to be profitable and help others in less than 3 months.     Other Ways You Can Help  If you can't spend the money to help, please let people others know that we can help them find jobs.

story:
In English: Call to Action: This is 1st 100% Eco and humanitarian friendly business in the world. Call to action for all humans to support the environment, small businesses, humans and community solidarity in small cities and towns globally. I have rejected venture capitalist and angels, because I believe in man kinds willingness to improve our world, so support my crowdfunding campaign lower your impact, support small business and help create strong micro communities and support those in need around the world. 

En Français: Appel à l'action: C'est 1er 100% Eco et business friendly humanitaire dans le monde. Appel à l'action pour tous les humains pour soutenir l'environnement, les petites entreprises, les humains et la solidarité de la communauté dans les petites villes et villages dans le monde. J'ai rejeté venture capitaliste et des anges, parce que je crois dans de nombreux types volonté d'améliorer notre monde, donc soutenir ma campagne de crowdfunding réduire votre impact, soutenir les petites entreprises et aider à créer de solides micro communautés et soutenir ceux qui en ont besoin dans le monde entier.


In English: The Project: The project has 4 targets one to support the local economy as a platform online and physically in the form of a cafe/market place that enables the sale of locally made and produced goods between small business, mom-and-pops, farmers, artists and charities directly to the local community insuring economic simulation and community solidarity. Second, to lower the human environmental impact on the world, model 100% environmentally friendly, humanitarian friendly, solidarity friendly and vegetarian business practices to support, model and encourage other business owners and the general public to act environmentally and socially responsible while helping those in need. Third, to bring the same high standard, service and products of the big city to smaller cities and towns. Finally, to create strong communities and humanitarian support by developing and nurturing micro-communities around the world through community consciousness and compassion.

En Français: Le projet: Le projet a 4 objectifs un à soutenir l'économie locale comme une plate-forme en ligne et physiquement sous la forme d'un lieu café / marché qui permet la vente de produits fabriqués et produits localement entre les petites entreprises, maman-et- pops, des agriculteurs, des artistes et des organismes de bienfaisance directement à la communauté locale assurant la simulation économique et la solidarité de la communauté. Deuxièmement, pour réduire l'impact environnemental de l'homme sur le monde, le modèle 100% respectueux de l'environnement, les pratiques de solidarité affaires amical et végétariens humanitaires pour soutenir, le modèle et encourager les autres propriétaires d'entreprises et le grand public à agir écologiquement et socialement responsable tout en aidant les personnes dans avoir besoin. Troisièmement, pour apporter la même qualité, le service et les produits de la grande ville pour les petites villes. Enfin, pour créer des collectivités solides et l'aide humanitaire, en développant et entretenir des micro-communautés du monde entier à travers la conscience de la communauté et de la compassion.





In English: Why support the Project: Your will help develop strong micro communities around the world, by operating eco-friendly it will organically increase the eco operations of other surrounding business, by supporting charities it will touch a larger body of people  in need and by bring small business products to consumers it will help the longevity of start-ups, mom-and-pops, local farmers.  So support me in supporting our earth and humans around the world as I open the first 100% eco and humanitarian friendly and operated business in small cities and towns around the world. #1 Grenoble, France in 2017!

En Français: Pourquoi soutenir Le Projet: Votre permettra de développer de solides communautés micro dans le monde entier, par éco-il organiquement augmenter les opérations écologiques d'autres affaires entourant l'exploitation, en soutenant les organismes de bienfaisance, il touchera un corps plus grand de personnes dans le besoin et par apporter des produits de petites entreprises pour les consommateurs, il contribuera à la longévité des start-ups, maman-et-pop, les agriculteurs locaux. Donc, me soutenir dans le soutien de notre terre et les humains à travers le monde que j'ouvre le premier 100% écologique et convivial humanitaire et entreprise exploitée dans les petites villes et villages à travers le monde. # 1 Grenoble, France en 2017!

In English: Why Green Canteen and Our Biggest Risk: As this is the first 100% eco and humanitarian friendly operated company and hopefully in the world -hopefully one day the first global chain- the biggest challenge we face is maintain our core values of operating 100% waste free, humanitarian focused, vegetarian and eco friendly. Many business will claim to be eco-friendly, but if you really look at all the operation practices, you will find less than eco-friendly says and short cuts. For example, we will waste no food, use only eco or degradable friendly products and give all uneaten food to those in need. When you operate under a social project, you have held to a much higher standard than a regular business, so we will have not room for mistakes in our operations and culture as the slightest incident could put our brand at stake. To mitigate this we will employ and partner with groups and individuals that have the same beliefs and monitor our operations daily.  So, support Green Canteen Today and support your world, humanity and building communities.

En Français: Pourquoi vert Canteen et notre plus grand risque: Comme cela est la première 100% écologique et exploités par la compagnie amicale humanitaire et nous espérons que dans le monde -hopefully un jour le premier à chaîne mondiale le plus grand défi auquel nous sommes confrontés est de maintenir nos valeurs fondamentales de fonctionnement 100% sans déchets, humanitaire ciblée, végétarien et respectueux de l'environnement. Beaucoup d'affaires se prétendre être respectueux de l'environnement, mais si vous regardez vraiment toutes les pratiques de fonctionnement, vous trouverez moins respectueux de l'environnement dit et raccourcis. Par exemple, nous allons perdre aucune nourriture, utiliser uniquement éco ou dégradables produits écologiques et donner à tous les aliments non consommés à ceux dans le besoin. Lorsque vous faites fonctionner dans un projet social, vous avez tenu à un niveau beaucoup plus élevé qu'une entreprise régulière, donc nous aurons pas de place pour des erreurs dans nos opérations et de la culture que le moindre incident pourrait mettre notre marque en jeu. Pour atténuer cela, nous allons employer et en partenariat avec des groupes et des individus qui ont les mêmes croyances et surveillent quotidiennement nos opérations. Ainsi, le soutien vert Cantine Aujourd'hui et soutenir votre monde, l'humanité et la construction des communautés.

In English: Who am I: I have been a humanitarian my whole life. I have provide shelter, food, clothes, money, friendship, employment, education and mentoring 1000s. Today, I am vegetarian, life 100% eco-friendly, 100% humanitarian friendly and activity contribute to my local community as much and as often as I can with my time, love and support (financial or emotional). I have an MBA, MS HR/ Organization Development, MS Education and have traveled to over 100 countries and know over 300 cultures. After traveling the world and seeing over 100 countries and returning home to New York, I felt inspired to do more and create a global green and humanitarian business that would help the environment, other do-gooders, support small businesses and promote community even in the smallest towns and cities around the world. I wanted also to add value to small cities and towns that are often looked over and not given the same service, product and experience value as big cities. Finally, I wanted to help the world reconnect with their sense of humanity and what it means to show human kindness. Green Canteen does that!

En Français: Qui suis-je: Je suis un humanitaire toute ma vie. Je dois fournir un abri, de la nourriture, des vêtements, de l'argent, l'amitié, l'emploi, l'éducation et 1000s mentorat. Aujourd'hui, je suis végétarien, la vie 100% écologique, 100% convivial humanitaire et l'activité contribuent à ma communauté locale autant et aussi souvent que je peux avec mon temps, l'amour et le soutien (financier ou émotionnel). J'ai un MBA, MS HR / Organisation pour le développement, l'éducation et MS ai voyagé dans plus de 100 pays et je sais plus de 300 cultures. Après avoir parcouru le monde et de voir plus de 100 pays et retour à la maison à New York, je me suis senti inspiré pour faire plus et de créer une entreprise verte et humanitaire mondiale qui contribuerait à l'environnement, d'autres bien-pensants, soutenir les petites entreprises et de promouvoir la communauté, même dans le les plus petites villes et villes à travers le monde. Je voulais aussi ajouter de la valeur aux petites villes et villages qui sont souvent regardé et pas donnés le même service, le produit et la valeur de l'expérience que les grandes villes. Enfin, je voulais aider le monde à renouer avec leur sens de l'humanité et ce que cela signifie pour montrer la bonté humaine. Vert Canteen fait cela!


PAST PROJECTS OF MINE: CLOTHES SWAPPING FOR CHARITY     PROJETS PASSÉS DE MINE: VÊTEMENTS ECHANGE POUR LA CHARITÉ

ME ON MY LAST WORLD TOUR: KAZAKHSTAN COUNTRY 90 & HER TEA! MON DERNIER TOUR DU MONDE: KAZAKHSTAN PAYS 90 & HER TEA!

Now you know me & my awesome project, so support me in supporting our planet, our community & our humanity by becoming a Green Canteen Founding Donor! 

Maintenant, vous savez moi et mon projet génial, donc me soutenir dans le soutien de notre planète, notre communauté et notre humanité en devenant un donateur vert Canteen fondateur!
Thank you with Hugs &  Merci avec Bisous, 
Harlem Williams 

Perks: 

5: Party Starter.. I Could Hug U!: Thanks for getting the party started... The next awesome thing you can do is share the campaign to help get the word out. Big Hug for starting the party!  

10: Green Canteen Founder+SCREAM!:  I am SCREAMING thank to you! You are now a Green Canteen Founding Donor and a permanently in the Green Canteen Community.  You will receive campaign and project updates via our Facebook page, YouTube Channel and on Indiegogo. Keep Starting Dreams! If you were here, I would hug you!  Here is the link to Green Canteen's FB page like it for updates:

20: Rock Star+Kickstarter+SCREAM!: SCREAMING THANK YOU 2X!  You get your name SCREAMED & a SHOUT-OUT on Green Canteen's Facebook Page. You can check the FB page in the next 24 hours for to see your NAME SCREAMED on Green Canteen's page, because our are such a ROCK STAR deserving to have your name in lights. You can repost it or tag your SCREAM to share with your Friends! Plus you get the 10+ Perks. Thx Rock Star!

30: MVP+TWEET That+SCREAM! STILL SCREAMING 3X! This time you get personalized message and shout-out on FB and Twitter to share or retweet with all your friends. You deserve it for making it RAIN GREEN. Check our new FB page and my twitter page in the next 24 hours for your shout-out. to share it with your friends. Plus all the +10 Perks

40: GoGo Green+YouTube Me+SCREAM! : No more sharing your screams! You get you own YouTube Thank you video. In your personal video I say name, thank you & giving you a big screaming Thank You. The best thing is you can save the video as a personal memory or share it with anyone using the YouTube link. Check our FB page in the next 24 hours for your video.

50:In the Fam+Taste It 2x+SCREAM!:You are now a life time Green Canteen (GC) Green Card Member. You will receive your e-Green card via email. You can use it to collect and earn points at GC Online or In-Store. You also get 2 free coffees or teas at the GC or you can pick one of the free Green Card goodies at the online store, Finally, you get that hug we owed you when you visit our store. Plus the 10+perks. 

75: Taste It 5x+SCREAM: You get 5 free coffees or teas in-store or 2 free Green Card Goodies online once the store is online and running. Plus the 10+ Perks.

100: GO Blue+Taste It 10x+SCREAM!:You have Blue card status for life. You name will be listed on our Indiegogo campaign, the Green Canteen blog and at harlemwilliams.com as big impact contributor. You get 10 Free coffees or teas in-store or 2 free Blue gifts online. You will receive the e-card and perk by email. Plus you get all the 10+ Perks. 

150: LaunchParty+TasteIt5x+SCREAM!: You get a personal invitation to one of our 3 launch parties in either New York, Paris and Grenoble. You can pick the launch party you prefer to attend out of the 3 we are having and we will send you the invite via email. Plus you get all the 5+ perks . 

300: VIP=3Cities=3Parties+SCREAM!: You are invited to all 3 VIP parties (New York, Paris and Grenoble)  and have access to the VIP section and VIP goodies. Plus, all the Taste It 5x+SCREAM Perks. 

500: VIP=3Citys=Partys=10x+SCREAM!: You have VIP access to all 3 launch parties (New York, Paris and Grenoble)  + the VIP section + VIP goodies at the party + lifetime Blue Card Membership + 10 free coffee/ tea and all the other 100+ perks. 

1000: GoPurple+Party+Blog+15xScream! You are a Purple Card member for life + your name plagued on the Hall of Frame store wall & website + a featured article on our blog +invitations to product testing, free samples & market promotions + VIP access to 3 launch parties (New York, Paris, Grenoble) + Taste It 15x + personal YouTube video + Media shout-outs + your name on our Indiegogo campaign + GC goodies + updates.  

2500: GlobalVIP+TripNYCParis+SCREAM!: You are a gold card member for life. You get a free trip to stay with me during launch week in Paris or New York (with promo events+party+stay+flight NYC -Paris or Paris-NYC roundtrip) + a private dinner with me +feature in my video for FrenchWeb.fr + plague on the Wall of Fame+ VIP to the 2 other launches+ Taste it 20x + YouTube Video+ Blog article+ Indiegogo/ FB SCREAM +  updates. 

5000: GlobalVIP+2TripSNYCParis+VP!: You are my Launch VP! You travel with me for 2 weeks & 2 launch parties (NYC+Paris). Your flights+accomodation (staying with me) is free. You get a drink named after you+ plague on  Wall of Fame + Taste it 20x+ a private dinner with me + gold card+ feature in my video for FrenchWeb.fr + VIP access to the other 2 Parties+ YouTube Video+ Blog article+ Indiegogo & FB SCREAM +updates. 

10000: CEO+3Trips+3Parties+365Drinks: My Launch CEO! You travel with me for 2 weeks 3 launches in 3 cities (NYC+Paris+Grenoble). Your flights+accomodation (staying with me) is free. You get 1 free drink a day for 1 yr @GC + a drink named after you+ a private dinner with me +feature in my video for FrenchWeb.fr + plague on the Wall of Fame+ VIP access at Launches + YouTube, Blog & Indiegogo Video + FB SCREAM + updates
